campaign.story:
This kickstarter program is for the compilation book 'Seeing Beyond the Surface' anthology. Which is a series of short stories, poems and art by and about people with a wide range of disabilities.
Project Overview
Project Name: Seeing Beyond the Surface Project
Description: This project will be a printed and bound book of personal stories both funny and serious that show how people with disabilities adapt and relate to everyday life and situations.
Project Purpose: To foster an understanding of an often misunderstood population.
Publication Date: June 2016
How the project came to be:
Welcome to a project that has been 5 years in the making. I am a published author but over the past few years have felt that I want to publish a book with meaning and purpose. And so this project was born.
 In 1994 I started dating a great guy with a wonderful family. I met his Aunt Renee shortly after and she was very quiet and shy. Being developmentally disabled it was hard for me to relate to her at first Over the following years I would see Renee from time to time however she was sheltered and protected by her mother. In 2008 we sadly lost her mom and Renee’s protected and secure world was thrown into turmoil. Being unemployed at the time I took the opportunity to try and help Renee through this time and also to get to know her better. The years have flown by and she is such a joy to be around. Society would consider her not normal but I always chuckle and think society has it backwards. She is more sure of herself and what she wants than I am. This project was actually her idea during one our many overnight outings she said “I wish I could write one.” (a book) And so this project begins.
In doing this project I battled with how to go about it. I wanted stories from many people dealing with a variety of disabilities but I wasn't sure how it would be received. I have been overwhelmed by the support and contributions.
Project Funds Overview (Where will the money go?)
   Marketing $280.00 - The Marketing funds will be used for promoting the book online and create a website to bring additional awareness.
   Contributors Gift Book $350.00 -  For contributing and supporting this project we would like to gift each contributor to the book a copy.
   Publishing Costs for 250 Black and White Books $870.00
It would not be possible for this project to happen without the support and guidance of a great many individuals including but not limited to: All the amazing writers, poets and artists who contributed, the Abilities Solution for all of their support and giving my Aunt a home all of these years, the SBTS team who volunteered countless hours going through submissions and every single person with a disability visible to the human eye or not who struggles to be understood and accepted.
THANK YOU EVERYONE!!

We are fortunate to have many submissions coming in. Our selections have been completed and the book is on schedule for publishing in late May 2016.

campaign.story:
We are currently developping a new free-to-play game called MechaPunk : a mechas, giant monsters and transformable robots type of game based in a cyberpunk japanese world. It's a "Clash-of-Clans" type strategy game.
We studied more than 25 games of the same type and took the best parts of them and removing what wasn't so cool. So this game should have all the best parts without the frustration encountered sometimes in these kind of games. 
 Here are a few of the features of the game: 
Play without waiting! You won't have to purchase gems to be able to fight as many times as you want !
Coop Mode : attack hard-to-beat bases with the help of other players and share the loots! Auto-detection of nearby devices to play with your friends !
Six game modes: Solo and Multiplayer, but also Coop, Arena, Defend and Missions. You will never get bored with this game diversity ! 
Transformable robots : up to 8 heroes assemblies have to be found during Missions. Once you get all the right parts, you can add new transformable heroes to your army ! 
Trade or buy parts on the black market ! 
Steal other players' expansions ! You can win up to 5 subsidiary bases and get many more resources from these expansions! 
Brotherhood : send gifts and exchange resources or even help other members of your corporation ! 
Catch giant monsters when they attack your base and re-use them during your attacks. You can also collect DNA samples and create your own rare monster ! 
Strategy-based attacks : you can beat hard bases if you have a good attack strategy 
RPG elements : you can assign points at each new level! For example increase life points, agility, armour, or even attack range ! Each unit has its built-in characteristics (ground or air unit, melee or shooting, etc) but you can customize each unit as you like ! 
Destroying the headquarter : destroys all the other buildings as they are all linked to the main building. 
Auto Graphic Detection : The first time the game is launched, it automatically lowers graphic complexity according to processing power available so that each gaming experience is fluid no matter what device it's played on.
Buildings
Gold and Uranium are the two main resources. You can gather and stock them in the appropriate buildings: 
Each building is upgradable : you start at level 1 and when you have enough gold, you can upgrade it . There will be a total of 16 buildings levels for each building
Heroes
Each hero will be transformable and upgradable..
SnowPiercer
Basilisk
Units
Here are some samples of units. Each unit will be customizable
the units will be upgradable infinitely! but it will become harder and harder to upgrade to the next level.
Giant monsters
In the game, you will have the opportunity to catch or to create giant monsters, and use them in battle ! Be careful, because training them is quite a challenge, so they sometimes go berserk and start attacking your own troops. But this is a skill and you can improve it at a point where it will never occur. You can equip them with armors, like a regular human to protect them from damages.
Godzilla
Helldog
King Kong
Defense Turrets
Rocket-launcher (terre/air) Ground/air.
Missiles (air only) Vertical.
Canons balls can be destroyed by shooting them ! (zone damages).
Laser (ground).
Lightning strike type that progresses from unit to unit until there is no more power.
Freeze tower (zone : slow down the units).
Tower that changes the behaviour of one unit by making him attack his own side (only 1 available).
Tower that launch a subterranean wave that makes a group of units jump into the air then crash on the ground (does also damages to buildings nearby).
Tower that sends a ring of fire that damages everything on its path 
Radiating tower that affects only biologic creatures.
Black Market   
A market will be available for the players and will give them useful objects to develop units. The more the building will be developped, the more it will have good items in store (DNAs, armors, speedup bonuses, etc.).
Item examples :
Experience points
Hero Experience points
1 free update (rarely)
Building time speedup
New hero part
Monsters armories
Salt, mercury and alchemix sulfur
Uranium/gold production speedups
Army creation cost rebate
Monsters genetic code Shields (1 per day with monthly pack)
Ressources
Selling & buying units   
 Each player will have the opportunity to sell units when they are not online, in exchange for ressources or even gems. This wil allow other players to attack bases otherwise unbeatable by buying stronger units.
Alchemy laboratory
An alchemy laboratory will be available at the fifth level. The player will have the opportunity to gather sulfur, mercury of salt during his missions or buy some on the black market. When the quantity of each ingredient is sufficient, he will have the opportunity to complete a new alchemic work. The final work (iosis) will allow players to produce Alkaest. Alkaest will give opportunity to tranform gold into uranium and vice-versa.
There will be a total of 6 game modes
Each mode brings its uniqueness to the game. Of course there will be the very requested Coop mode to play with your friends (the devices close to you will be automatically detected so you can play with friends easily) !
And of course there will also be Clan Wars and many Events !
http://GlobGlobGames.com
http://Mechapunk.com

What will we do with the money?
 The money will be used in 6 main areas:
 1) programming : I'm a Digital Signal Processing engineer and I am also a programmer so my task will be to gather all the code parts and assemble them in the main program. We use Unity 3D that is a very powerful and well optimized high level game design program.

Developping time will be around 6-8 months

campaign.story:
Hello KickStarter! 
We interact with space dozens of times a day. GPS, point of sale, maps, weather. Space-enabled data makes our modern life possible. Yet few people know the companies operating the satellites. Fewer still have access to the satellites themselves.
Weebill wants to change that. 
Why? Because we now stand on the cusp of a new era of space adventure. Advances in technology and changes in communication are rewriting the rules of the business. 
The fundamental vision of Weebill is a simple one; we see a future where space becomes easily accessible, affordable and open to all.    
We want to spark this movement.
Weebill’s HyperQube satellite offers the most powerful CubeSat available on the market in an incredibly small 10cm³ chassis while being readily available to the public for the extraordinary price of $50 000AUD.
Available to all, capable of limitless missions, the HyperQube will be the best orbiting platform for the surging space-enabled data market.* With a new space economy springing up, this unit will be able to conduct a greater variety of tasks than similarly sized, less powerful satellites. 
Early motherboard prototypes of the HyperQube
The HyperQube encrypts incoming and outgoing data with the best in industry standards – AES-256bit, Serpent 256bit & TwoFish 256bit on all incoming and outgoing data with absolutely no interruption to operations.
Most satellites have little to no encryption system in place, a worrying trend given the expected growth in orbitals and their applications. With HyperQube, your data will be scanned and encrypted through your browser, which is then sent to our master servers. From there, the data is compressed and encrypted further, making sure it's safe to send. It is then transferred to the ground-stations for transmission. The whole process is fast, easy and safe.
Funding will allow further testing of shielding and on-board redundancies to ensure smooth operation in space.
In the heart of the HyperQube lies 6 Weebill Atom X1 motherboards working together as one, otherwise known as the X6. The Atom X1 is based of the 64bit ARM architecture and has been tested and proven for reliability and low-energy requirements. The X6 features 24-cores at 1.6GHz and 12GB of high-performance DDR3 RAM. That's up to 700GFLOPS of processing power available from a 10cm³ satellite. Something unheard of until now.
The heart of the HyperQube, the Weebill Atom X1 Mark II & III
The HyperQube will be powered by atomOS, our non-embedded Linux-based distribution built from the ground up. It provides a hardened operating system built for security, stability and speed. The OS will be released once the HyperQube has flown at least once. Regular security patches will be updated over the air, ensuring the HyperQube will always be the the most secure satellite out there.
Backers will also receive a copy of the Weebill Ground Control application. Allowing you to check on the satellite's location and status, see the latest images, check on development updates and much more. 
Weebill ATOM X6 ARM CPU - 24 Cores @ 1.6GHz 
12GB DDR3 RAM
AES - Serpent - TwoFish 256bit encryption on all communications 
Next-Generation S-Band communication systems 
1.2TB SSD 
2x 35mm 13MP 4K Cameras 
1U High Efficiency Solar Panels (28% Efficiency)
Lifetime in space (Without propulsion): 6-12 months. 
Early prototype of the HyperQube running completely on its internal power.
The HyperQube is versatile machine, with an open-ended design that can support a variety of functions both in communication with the ground and autonomously. The CubeSat can be deployed for single purpose or mixed missions. For those who purchase the CubeSat, or obtain time on it as a perk, a HyperQube will allow you to:
Perform complex calculations and see the results
Access the camera for photos and videos
Obtain data from sensors
Conduct scientific research
Support games in orbit
Did we miss something? Send your idea to us and if we can do it, we will!
After successful funding, the Weebill HyperQube will be available to the public from July 2017 on our website for $50 000AUD. 
Companies are recognizing the wide application of space-enabled data, and consequently, the new commercial uses of space itself. Financial technology start-ups are nibbling into the transaction flows of legacy banks. They are matching lenders with borrowers, distributing pay via mobile phones, and flocking to niches existing banks are prevented from servicing. Weebill represents an early-to-market solution for a domain where regulated banks don't currently dominate. It has the ability to conduct transactions on a highly encrypted platform. As the nature of banking changes and splinters, Weebill will be positioned to service the flow of transactions including Bitcoin and digital currency Hyper Ledger.
But the business uses for the HyperQube aren't just limited to banking.  A few others are:
Short and and medium term off-the-grid and secure data storage
Encrypted communications
Event monitoring (Space weather and Earth weather)
Earth Remote Sensing (Real-time magnetometer observations, real-time Geiger counter observations and more)
The Weebill Atom X1 Mark II
Currently, our demonstrator mission can be ready for the launch to Low Earth Orbit with spectrum access available by January 2017. The launch window is between February - July 2017. If Weebill raises the $AUD230,000 needed for the first launch, a powerful new tool will become a reality for the space-faring public. The HyperQube’s applications are limited only by your imagination.
My name is Gavrilo "Gav" Koncar. I'm the founder of Weebill. I believe that the advances in computing that have revolutionised communication will soon redefine define space, opening up the frontier to individuals in a way unthinkable only a few years before. I believe space activity will soon be in everyone’s hands. Weebill will make that possible. 
Weebill was founded in 2014 with the simple goal of placing an imaging telescope in space. After a few months had passed, we decided that the marketplace for imaging devices was already well-served. But in our design-phase we came upon something: inside the core of the telescope was one of the most powerful motherboards designed for space. Since then we have focused on perfecting the board and making it available on a mass scale, with one core belief; space needs to be open, secure and available to many. 
Our team includes Dr Jason Held as our principle adviser. Jason is a former US Army expert in military space missions. Jason's experience with the Hubble and International Space Station provides Weebill Space Systems with connections to other manufacturers and partners within the industry as well as direct contact to various government organisations.
Our primary satellite engineer is Dusan Djordjevic, who holds a dual bachelors in Science and Engineering.
So, what's in the name? The smallest bird in Australia is the Weebill. It's an extremely nimble creature, fast and more than able to thrive alongside Australia's larger, louder species. Weebill Space Systems is also a native of Australia. We develop our technologies in the same spirit: small, nimble and incredibly effective. All our products are designed and created in Melbourne, Australia.
Mission Control is supplied by Saber Astronautics. The founders represent a wide array of backgrounds and capabilities, combining traditional space engineering, and military space operations. Their engineers helped develop the Hubble Space Telescope and International Space Station. Saber is based in Sydney and Denver.
Our primary rocket launch contractors are AU Aerospace, who specialize in CubeSat launches. They're based in Adelaide.
The build of the satellite itself will be in-house here in Melbourne, Australia while extensive testing will occur at UNSW Space Research Facility in Canberra. This will be done multiple times to ensure a maximum chance of success. 
Of the funding sought, $AUD55,000 will be used for the production of the first HyperQube. The launch window (February 2016 - July 2017) is expected to cost $AUD50,000. There is an additional cost of $AUD75,000 for insurance of the launch and $AUD20,000 for mission control by Saber Astronautics. Regulatory changes in Australia may soon favor small satellite launches, which may possibly reduce costs, as well.
The same technological progress that has seen computers shrink from room-sized boxes, to desktop units and finally, to smart phones, is now changing space. The space age will finally be in everyone’s reach. Help make Weebill’s HypeQube a reality. Be a part of the future. 
*Subject to any applicable export control restrictions
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There is the risk radiation interferes with the HyperQube's computing functions. We will test the CubeSats circuitry in space-like conditions at UNSW Canberra before launch. The funding we are seeking will cover the laboratory testing cost needed for maximum assurance of space-readiness.

It's possible there will be communication problems with the HyperCube, which can lead to a loss of the high-speed communications systems. Our backup UHF system will be in place for this specific situation and can be used to diagnose and restart the communications in full speed.

The HyperQube could fail to function upon launch. If that happened, it would likely be possible to collect data which could help advance a follow-on mission. In the event that the rocket carrying the HyperQube fails, insurance could reimburse company for the cost - providing funding for a second attempt.

Please understand that space is extremely difficult and unpredictable in regards to satellites operating. In case our mission is cut short and you don't receive your time on the satellite, you will receive it on the next launch.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
INTRODUCTION
Remote is a psychological thriller. The story follows Daniel Grey and the events behind the disappearance of his brother and friends. Remote addresses several key themes and important issues in our society, including missing persons, the dangers of social media, addiction, obsession, and the profound impact of deep personal loss. We have assembled a diverse, experienced, passionate team that is both eager and committed to this project.
This film is the first chapter in a much larger universe, The Red String Theory. This complex storyline was first conceived of in 2011 by Dakota R. Kuhlman. Dakota founded Exit Reality Entertainment in the summer of 2015, with the goal of bringing Remote and The Red String Theory to a wide audience. Exit Reality Entertainment is a young, dedicated, media production company with the goal of bringing entertaining, original media to film, the web, and print.
We are currently in the final stages of pre-production. We have the team, the cast, the screenplay, and the budget. Our team is ready and excited to make the jump to production.
THE MOVIE - SYNOPSIS
Remote is a psychological thriller and independent film with underlying elements of comradery and humor. The story introduces the character Daniel Grey, who is compelled to perform his own investigation after the disappearance of his brother and friends. During this investigation, he discovers a series of disturbing, unsolved cases too similar to be coincidence. Daniel Grey receives a call from Charles Dawson, a realtor, who informs him there may be a link between one of his listings and the missing students. The film reveals the shocking and sometimes hilarious events that take place leading up to the disappearance of Daniel's brother and friends.
ABOUT OUR CAMPAIGN
Our production budget for Remote is $25,000. By achieving this goal, we can move forward and begin production in early June.
We decided the best way to fund Remote is in two iterations: production and post production. We have chosen this approach so we can begin principal filming as soon as possible and to ensure an accurate, post-production budget.
This Kickstarter campaign only covers the production stage of this film. If the community likes our project, we hope to cover post-production costs later this year through a second, smaller campaign.
We have designed a solid production budget that cuts all possible costs without sacrificing production quality. The Exit Reality Entertainment team has opted-out of any payment for the film - we are not paying ourselves from this campaign. We have diligently polished and reduced our budget to it’s lowest possible level. Our total production costs are approximately $17,000, excluding the cost of running this crowdfunding campaign. Ultimately, there are some costs we simply cannot cut.
This is our most ambitious project. However, we believe this story is worth telling and that we can deliver a great film - which is why we’re asking for your help in the development of this film.
BUDGET BREAKDOWN
Our costs are broken down into nine major categories: equipment, essential personnel, location and legal, craft services, props and set design, hair and makeup, contingency, incentive costs, and crowdfunding fees.
Some of our costs have been mitigated and delayed. Specifically, we are hiring three essential outside personnel who are willing to delay the bulk of their payment. While we still need to rent or purchase some equipment, we are borrowing what we can from within our network. We are even opting to build our own jib, rails, dolly, frame, slider and other rigs.
We have reduced other costs, such as hair, makeup, props, and set design to their bare minimum.
We believe we have a realistic, accurate, and frugal budget for this production, and are taking every opportunity to minimize costs, while also ensuring the quality of the film.
MEET THE TEAM 
We’ve hand-picked a fantastic, talented team for this project. Our team is both committed and capable of producing a compelling film. We are all very grateful and excited to work on this project. Get excited! ;)
Dakota Kuhlman - Writer/Producer
Dakota Kuhlman
Dakota Kuhlman is the founder of Exit Reality Entertainment and creator of The Red String Theory Universe. Dakota is the screenwriter and producer for Remote and also plays the character Daniel Grey. Dakota was nominated for the ACTF Region 3 Acting Award. In addition to his degree in Theatrical Production and Performance at Bradley University, Dakota has received training from the Royal Shakespeare Company at The Globe in London. Among his past works include the short film, The Interview and an original Slender Man feature-length film, The Pale One, both of which have inspired Remote and The Red String Theory.
Jason Snydacker - Director
Jason Snydacker
Jason Snydacker, of Snydacker Production, has worked with the production team to secure casting, break down the script, and prepare for production. Jason has produced and directed numerous short films, including Junkie.
Matthew Pleasant - Co-Producer/Casting Director
Matthew Pleasant
Matt Pleasant is a Peoria, Illinois native and graduate of Columbia College Chicago, with degrees in Creative Writing (Fiction) and Theatre (Acting). He has received training in Improv and sketch comedy from the renown Second City training center and worked as a Voice Over talent for Performance Associates Inc. Pleasant went on to write and produce the short It Doesn't Happen Any Day, and currently Produces and stars in the comedy web series, Define: Normal.
Mark Serletic - Director of Photography 
Mark Serletic
Mark Serletic studied at the Illinois Institute of Art - Chicago. His past works include videos such as the Hippocrates Trailer.
Emily Wilson - Assistant Director & Line Producer
Emily Wilson
Emily Wilson is the Central Operating Officer for Exit Reality Entertainment, as well a the Assistant Director and Line Producer for Remote. Emily acts as head of Peoria's Project Canvas. Additionally, she is the project manager for the upcoming YouTube series, Drunk Retro Movie Reviews, and facilitated the production of Memorial For A Dove's music video, If Only By The Light Of Our Lanterns. 
Cedric Knuth - Costume & Set Design 
Cedric Knuth
Cedric Knuth, of Exit Reality Entertainment, is the costume, set, and prop designer and is also responsible for production journal updates. Cedric was the Vice President of APO at Bradley, University. He has participated in numerous theater productions, both on stage and behind the scenes. He is the creator and lead role of the newly launched YouTube series, Knight Vision.
Phantom Noise - Composers
Brandon Ousley, Brandon Jones, Marc Redshaw
Phantom Noise, Brandon Ousley, Brandon Jones, and Marc Redshaw, is a Peoria-based industrial rock/metal band that has produced music since 2006. Phantom Noise will producing the full original soundtrack for Remote. You can view their music and Facebook page here.
That, friends, is our production team! 
We also have a fantastic team working behind-the-scenes. This team is responsible for the business side of pre-production and post-production, handling research and design for the crowdfunding campaign, developing the production budget, outlining contracts, editing videos, writing content, updating social media, and preparing strategies for distribution and marketing.
Additional cast members include:
David Dunn as Mr. Pleasant
Gabby Fernandez as Heidi Smith 
Brian McKinley as Jesse Chance 
David C. Brown as Howard Tanner 
Matthew Pleasant as Mr. Vice
Juanita Williams as Waitress 
Mary Moore as Operator 
 WHY THIS PROJECT IS IMPORTANT AND WORTH FUNDING
We believe our project is important and worth pursuing. It's worth our time, energy, labour, blood, sweat, and focus. But why is it worth funding for you, Kickstarter reader?
Remote:
Maintains a Sense of Humor - Remote touches on serious issues while conveying a true-to-life sense of comedy through the close inter-personal relationships of the characters.
Offers an Engaging Production Process - We promise transparency and engagement throughout development, so you may closely follow production, offer input on final product, and get to know our team.
Has a Talented and Committed Team - Our team has diverse creative experience and areas of expertise, which means that we can actually deliver a compelling and entertaining movie.
Addresses Real, Important Issues - The story covers the important topics of missing persons and the danger of social media.
Focuses on Key Central Themes - Key themes include the inner struggle of addiction, the profound impact of a personal loss, and the consequences of obsession over something outside of your control. 
Is Complex in It’s Storytelling - This movie has many intertwined elements and is innovative both in story and delivery.
Is Part of a Large Immersive Storyline - This film part of a much longer, complex, and compelling story within the The Red String Theory universe. 
PROJECTED TIMELINE & ACTIVITIES TO DATE
We have made huge progress in the development of this film since it was first conceived.
To date, we've formed a great team, created a great script, held auditions, secured a full cast, secured ideal filming locations, developed a budget, and created promotional materials.
You can view our interactive timeline here.
 Check out our Facebook page for fresh, daily updates, promo materials, and behind-the-scenes content.
THE RED STRING THEORY
Remote takes place within The Red String Theory storyline. Over the next several years, we will release a series of films within the larger universe of The Red String Theory.
The Red String theory follows the interconnected storylines of several individuals and revolves around the concept of predetermined circumstances. As the characters develop, they all eventually discover they are not there by chance. In fact, they should not be there at all.
The Red String Theory follows three families through stories of hidden political agendas, power struggles, military conspiracy, global affairs, and the manipulation and control of human experience.
Everything you’ve done, everything you believe, is a result of the choices you’ve made in the past. This is the undeniable truth. But is everything you believe a result of actions within your control? Is it possible that the choices you have made - the choices that have brought you down this path to where you are today - were designed and intentionally placed in front of you by an unseen person, one with a hidden agenda? What if every choice you’ve made has been designed and orchestrated. Not predestined, but predetermined, calculated, implemented.
After three generations of these families, three young individuals discover that their very existence is due to events that took place framed within this illusion of choice. As this discovery is made, a dark plot unfolds to transform the entire world that they know into something different.
The question remains: if every choice you ever made was predetermined, how can you stop the inevitable?
OUR REWARDS
We thought about our incentives carefully.
Our incentives are designed to be engaging, to provide additional insight into our characters and story, to give credit where credit is due, and to be unique, handcrafted, and personal. Our incentives also needed to provide value and involve you, our supporters, while also limiting the need to inflate our production budget - and consequently our total Kickstarter goal. We believe we have accomplished all of this.
In addition to our unique incentives, we are also including some traditional incentives, such as the digital and physical movie and soundtrack, along with movie memorabilia.
Our favorites incentives include:
$5: Special Thanks Credit in the Film! 
$10: Behind-the-Scenes Production Journal and Q&A’s Access 
$25: Digital Download of Full Original Soundtrack by Phantom Noise *recommended* 
$50: Live Stream of Production, Pre-Release Digital Premiere, Custom Missing Person’s Flyer 
$75: Memorabilia Package 
$125: Bizarre Skype Call from Mr. Vice, Personalized Thank You Video 
$175: Vinyl Figure Character Collectable 
$250: Your Missing Persons Poster in the Movie! 
$300: Incorporate an Easter Egg in the Film
A full list of our incentives is also listed on the right sidebar of this page.
We hope you enjoy the incentive options. We put a lot of time and thought into them and would love to hear from you.
FINAL THOUGHTS
THANK YOU for reading about Remote and getting to know us and the scope of this project. This project, like anything worth doing, is difficult, but we are very excited to be a part of it. Remote and The Red String Theory are stories we want to share with the world.
To make this movie happen, we just need your support. Everything else in place.
Please help support this project by making a Kickstarter contribution on the right side of this page.
We can’t do this without you. Thank you.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
RISKS & CHALLENGES

As with any film production or entrepreneurial endeavor, there is an element of risk - both to the producers and the financiers. There will be challenges we must overcome, some which are expected (and that can be planned for), and others that may arise without notice.

Risk to this project include: underestimating our budget, scheduling conflicts, breach of contract, film delays, conflicts within the team, copyright protection, successful distribution and audience reach, and of course, not achieving our Kickstarter goal.

We believe our budget is tuned to near perfection, and should sufficiently cover production, with post-production funding to come later. We’ve done our best to factor in the cost of this Kickstarter campaign and all production costs while keeping a modest 10% contingency fund of our budget before factoring in crowdfunding costs.

Other challenges will have to be solved if they arise, and will be mitigated by clear contracts, prudence, good team communication, and advanced planning.

In examining the risk to you, our supporters, there is the risk of non-delivery, delays in production, and delays in shipping. We believe we’ve taken all possible steps to mitigate these risks.

This project will be completed.

We have a team extremely committed to this project, as can be seen in our Kickstarter video. To show our progress, we will post weekly video updates, announcements on our production journal, and social media updates.

We will monitor and allocate our funds closely to ensure they are spent only where needed and pre-allocated, and that spending is done so frugally. To ensure this, we are requiring approval from two of the following positions: Executive Producer, Operations Manager, and Finance Director.

Lastly, there is the risk that our incentives may be delayed. Unfortunately, this is a common issue on crowdfunding platforms. We are taking steps to ensure we meet our projected timeline by planning deadlines for incentive production, setting internal shipping deadlines, developing content-delivery systems, significantly overestimating our delivery dates, and delegating responsibilities.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Let me inform you that as of 2015, the online dating industry is worth more than $2 billion and is still growing! The problem is...SOCIAL MEDIA! Dating is already difficult and staying in a relationship is even harder. 
The #1 dating disaster is being ignored while on a date because someone is twifing (twifing is the act of using social media, e.g., twitter, WhatsApp, Instagram, or facebook just to name a few), it makes you feel like a second fiddle to a smartphone. Social media is also a major factor in the increase of divorces. Google "social media prenups" you will be surprised. 
Twifless is the first and only matchmaking dating app based on interests and social media usage. If you prefer someone who's online no more than 5 hours a day you can select that, but if you prefer someone who spends less than an hour online, you can request that too! We use a "twifometer" algorithm that will compare the chemistry between individuals with emphasis on the time spent on social media. Understand, we are not eliminating social media users from the app, everyone is welcomed because we all use social media one way or another, including our team. It can be for communicating with someone in another country while traveling, apps for Security/Protection (Home alarms), Savings (Digital Coupons), or simply signing up to see those adorable baby photos everybody wants you to see...you know what we're talking about. Being the best dating app in this digital world is our only goal, by arranging successful long term relationships and instant proximity dating opportunities. The beauty of this niche...social media is not limited to just the U.S., the frustration of twifing while on a date or in a relationship is being felt around the world.
Our matching leads you to see eye to eye.
THE BENEFITS OF TWIFLESS.  
1. Good old fashion etiquette...eye to eye conversations! 
2. Possibly finding the love of your life!
3.  Monetary.
THE USE OF PLEDGES.  
Twifless will use the traditional free-to-fee method and therefore utilizing the pledges to generate revenue through marketing, maintaining app, and competitive expansion features where needed.

campaign.story:
Welcome
Hello everyone and thank you for checking out our kickstarter page. I appreciate you taking the time to do so. This game has been a long time in the making and testing. It is time to get it out to the public. Check out our web page and facebook.
www.headhonchogame.com
https://www.facebook.com/Head-Honcho-Game-199029413449510/
The game
Anyone who has ever worked will enjoy this game.  The object of the game is to purchase stock. The player with the most stock at the time is the boss and controls the game and makes all the decisions that arise during the game.  As the boss you decide peoples' fate, if they should be fired, fined, and any other decisions that need to be made. You manage strikes and negotiate what employees will get or not get. you’re the boss! Be as easy or as tough as you want, but beware because the tables can turn with just a roll of the dice and you may have to answer to someone else!
Whats in the box?
1 Quad Fold Board
8 Game Pawns
2 Dice
20 Write-Up Cards
20 Achievement Cards
20 Life Happens Cards
20 Sick Day Cards
20 Vacation Day Cards
Play Money ($1.00, $5.00, $10.00, $20.00, $50.00, $100.00)
100 Shares of Stock (25 1 Share & 15 5 Share)
1 Score Pad
Directions & Quick Start Rules
Quick Start Rules
We provided quick start rules so you can get right into playing the game. We know how frustrating it is to read through a bunch of rules before you can play a game.
Time Card & Will
Every employee must fill out their will and indicate where they want their money and stock to go if you happen to pull the death card! You can leave it all to one player, split it or give it back to the company.  Don't worry if you die; in this game you will have the opportunity to rejoin the game and still can take it all!
Human Resources
Start the game on this spot. You are not automatically hired. You must roll an odd number to get hired and start the game.
Restroom & Cafeteria
No one can leave the game for drinks, snacks, bathroom, etc until someone lands on one of these spots. If you do, you must pay a fine for leaving your work area. 
Training
Land here and you can do a training session on anything you want for the boss. If the boss feels like you did a good job, you will be rewarded with a bonus. If not, you get nothing.
Conference Room
When you land here you have the opportunity to meet with the boss and negotiate a pay increase, stock, vacation and sick time. Fight for all you can get!
Strike
When someone lands here all the players' team up and strike! Take this opportunity to negotiate for more pay, vacation & sick time and possibly more stock.
Lose Stock
When landing here you could lose your position as the boss, or maybe even the game.
Write-Up, Achievement and Life Happens Cards
Drawing on these cards can make or break you in this game. Many of these cards require decision making.  Don't worry, you will not be making them unless you’re the boss.
Vacation Day & Sick Day cards
Earn as many of these as you can, not having them will result in lost turns which means less opportunities to buy stock.
Expansion Packs
To bring even more excitement to the game we will be developing expansion card packs. The current cards are generic in nature to most jobs. The expansion pack will replace the write-up, achievement and life happens cards. They will be job specific to bring more of a personal experience to the game when you get an expansion pack related to your current job. It would also be fun to try expansion packs for jobs you have never done. The current expansion packs we are working on are:
Education
Medical
Police
Law
Information Technology
Construction
What people are saying about this game.
PLAY

Below is some comments people have made about the game.
Why back this game?
Its Different: There is not another game out there like this. 
Great Game Play: Everyone who play tested the game loved it.
Flexible: Create your own house rules to make the game even more exciting.
Expandable: With the expansion packs (soon to come) you can change the game to fit the profession you work in. This will make for even more exciting game play.
With your generous donation we can finish the printing of the money, stock, game cards, directions, quick start rules and score pads. With your help we can get this game finished and out to public.
Please consider helping us.  Everyone should have the chance to be the Head Honcho! Thank you for your time and consideration.

We were able to get the first run of 1000 boards, boxes, trays, game pieces and dice completed. Together with your help we can overcome the challenge of finishing this project and get it to market.

Martial artist and actor Brandon Lee Shealy will host this weekly web series.
What is the series about?
Each week a new martial arts instructor or master will be interviewed in their studio in these lighthearted episodes.  They'll tell about their history and demonstrate some of their favorite techniques, training routines, and secrets
Viewers may also get the chance to submit questions for upcoming masters
Ideally we would also like to interview a few action celebrities, mma sports figures, and stunt performers as well
It will be the only web-series of it's kind; focusing specifically on the full gamut of martial arts with step-by-step demonstrations
We'll be interviewing all types of instructors from Boxing, Wing Chun, Jiu-Jitsu, Muay Thai, Systema, Wrestling, Karate, Kali, Silat, Tae Kwon Do, Krav Maga, Jeet Kune Do, Various Kung Fu, Tricking, MMA, Sword-Fighting, and various others
What is the funding used for?
The show is relatively low cost to produce.  We already have a good camera and lighting.  The money raised will mostly go to microphones, other audio, the editor, and any unforeseen incidentals. 
Looking forward to your support on this exciting series!

campaign.story:
What is The Beeramid?
One Beeramid set includes a setup for each side of the table. 
The Beeramid is a new twist on the classic game of beer pong. Similar to beer pong, each side is comprised of ten cups and each cup is filled with a beverage of the players choice. The cups are arranged on three tiers, six on the bottom, three in the middle, and one on top, creating a pyramid-like structure. 
Our patent pending design enables every cup to be independently stabilized. Once a cup is "made," it can be removed along with its pedestal without effecting any of the other cups. With three tiers of cups to aim for, the game allows for endless possibilities like crazy bounces, backboard shots and countless formations.
PLAY

The base and every pedestal is designed with a lip to prevent the cups from falling. They are also designed to fit a wide variety of popular keg cups, even the brands with square bottoms. 
Every set comes complete for a standard two team match (two bases, two large pedestals, six small pedestals) and is packaged in a convenient drawstring backpack.
One Beeramid set includes a setup for each side of the table
The Goal:
Our goal is to make you excited about the weekend again!
One of our slogans is, "where competitive meets social." That's exactly what The Beeramid will provide. It creates a party where friends and strangers alike can play together, have fun and be competitive all at the same time!
We wanted to make The Beeramid strong enough to survive the elements of any party yet affordable. The money we raise will allow us to buy high quality materials and put us in the position to buy those materials in bulk. This saves us money, which saves you money!
So Many Formations!
PLAY

The Rewards
$1 GROUND FLOOR LEVEL : A round of applause for helping The Beeramid get that much closer to reality
$7 KEEP IT KOOZIE LEVEL : 2 Beeramid branded can koozies made of 4mm polyurethane foam. Free US shipping
$8 BOTTLES UP LEVEL : 1 Beeramid aluminum keychain bottle opener. Free US shipping   
$10 BALLS OUT LEVEL : 7 Beeramid branded ping pong balls with 3 star quality. Free US shipping
$20 LITTLE THIS LITTLE THAT LEVEL : 2 koozies, 1 keychain bottle opener, and 7 ping pong balls. Free US shipping
$40 EARLY BIRD SPECIAL : 1 Beeramid set. Be one of the first to receive The Beeramid set at a discounted price. Free US shipping
$45 THE BEST DAY OF YOUR LIFE LEVEL : 1 Beeramid set. Free US shipping.
$60 STACK, RACK AND ROLL LEVEL: 1 Beeramid set, 2 Koozies, 1 Bottle opener keychain, 7 Ping pong balls. Free US shipping 
$80 IT'S A PARTY LEVEL: You're going to have a problem with everyone wanting to play The Beeramid. Solution....more sets! 2 Beeramid Sets. Free US Shipping

campaign.story:
As a 20 year survivor of terminal cancer, I have learned about the highs and lows of life.  I choose to live the highs to the fullest. Since my first diagnosis on September 11, 1996, I have had 2 secondary cancers, I have been hit by a truck riding my bike, I have been diagnosed with heart failure and coronary artery disease caused by my original cancer treatments...all with a small and a lot of laughing. 
After my 5 year survival date of my original cancer (lymphoma) I decided I needed to do something positive to help others.  I started telling my story at cancer fundraising events. I started volunteering as a peer counselor for newly diagnosed patients. I even started directing a charity that hosts parties for children undergoing cancer treatments. I've help raise over $4 million dollars with fundraising events. Plus, I decided to try to win a pageant to share my story, and boy did that work!
In 2012, when my heart function had dropped to 10%, I started a bucket list. Most of the list was traveling or doing things like attending Miss Universe or going to Disneyland.  By the end of 2015, I had finished my bucket list, except for 2 items, writing a book about my survival story and being on the Ellen DEGENERES Show. 
So here is my Kickstarter to get the book done and published.  I already have a company willing to help me write and publish the book for just under $3500, the rest of the money will be used for shipping costs and promotional investments.
Help me check this bucklet list item off..
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Money is my biggest challenge right now. I am on disability and my heart issues continue to keep me in bed some days. Just making sure we can get this done and market it without setting me in the hole, is the biggest obstacle.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
I'm Gregory Thompson, and I'm seeking assistance in publishing a one-shot, 22-page horror comic called Lilacs. I wrote the comic and teamed up with talented artist Sofia Hagen, who did the interior and cover art, and letterer Jim McClain (Solution Squad). Sofia had a nostalgic style with flowing lines and simple aesthetics that drew me into her art. Take a look at this panel:
Example Panel from Lilacs, art by Sofia Hagen
 The Story
On his way to work, Max bumps into a lady selling flowers and is given a bouquet of Lilacs that transport him to visions to impossible to believe. But they involve Max himself and the flower lady is confident in what the lilacs predict.
If you're a fan of stories about fate, attempts at changing your future, and making decisions that could affect you forever, then Lilacs is the comic for you. With a Twlight-zone twist, Lilacs might make you rethink about chance and circumstance.
What's Done, What's to Come?
The comic book is complete. The cover, interior art, and lettering is 100% finished. This Kickstarter is to help us fund production costs to get Lilacs printed for the convention and author's event circuit. Our initial run will consists of about 250 copies.
Cover for Lilacs
"Hey, Tell Me More about the Rewards!"
You must be excited about the rewards, eh? Besides the obvious rewards that include copies of the comic book, you have a chance to get Gregory M. Thompson novels and original horror stories! Below are short synopses of the book you can choose from and yes, all will be signed:
Nightcry - Set in the present in a Midwestern small town, Nightcry is about Grant Sykes, who has returned to his hometown of Ilton to run the local paper. Soon, people start to die and fingers point to him--it doesn't help the evidence continues to amass against Grant. He thinks the deaths may have something to do with a supernatural being that killed his parents years ago, but the local Police Chief has other theories. Grant recruits the help of a ghosthunter to investigate the suspected banshee while Grant figures out means to prove his innocence.
The Golden Door - Two boys, ages 14 and 9, have recently lost their mother and have difficulties finding comfort in their emotionally and occasionally physically abusive father. That same summer, they witness their father continuously painting a door golden-yellow in their house and soon, their curiosity overcomes them to find out what's behind the door.
The Horde Trilogy - After hearing the converted tornado siren and watching a mass exodus from the campground that has served as home for three months, Percy, Jack, Harry, Melody and Joann make a decision to move further into the state park to find solace from the undead. However, as they move deeper into the forest, a discovery awaits them that is more horrific than what is chasing them.  
The Three Novels to Choose From
The Team
Gregory M. Thompson is a Science Fiction/Fantasy/Horror writer with publishing credits in Macabre Realms, Digizine, Aphelion Webzine, Concisely, Digital Dragon Magazine, Dark Gothic Resurrected, Midwest Literary Review, Roar and Thunder, The Fringe Magazine and more. He also has an award-nominated science fiction piece in the collection, Steampunk Anthology, published by Sonar4 Publications and a horror/western short story in the anthology Welcome to Hell, edited by Eric S. Brown. Nightcry, The Golden Door, Indiscriminate, Horde and My Only One are a few of his novels. His horror novel, Grandmother, was released in July 2014 by Black Rose. He has a short horror comic appearing in an upcoming anthology by GrayHaven Comics. For more information visit his official site at http://www.nightcrynovel.com.
Sofia Hagen was born to Austrian and Polish parents in Vorarlberg, Austria. Fluent in 5 languages, she studied at the Ecole Superieure d’arts Graphiques in Paris and at the University of applied arts in Vienna from which she graduated in 2008. In the same year she relocated to London where she has ever since been working as a freelance illustrator and spatial designer. Her main focus includes artwork for novelists and poets, album covers for musicians and bands based in the UK and Poland, up to branding campaigns and poster designs for independent films. Alongside all this she was involved in a fashion and costume design collaboration with Cornelia Klien with whom she founded the label aFIN in 2011, and worked as a freelance spatial designer for the likes of Zaha Hadid in London and Odile Decq in Paris. Check out more of her work at http://noisetteriesofi.blogspot.co.uk
Jim McClain is a full-time math teacher who has always dreamed of working in comics. He is the creator of Solution Squad, but is also a freelance letterer/designer whose first professional work was on Reading With Pictures: Comics That Make Kids Smarter. More info at http://www.solutionsquad.net/blog

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are risks and challenges in everything you do, right? From driving down the road to your favorite park to over-indulging in too much coffee. Well, publishing a comic book is no different. Sure there are tangible challenges like will the printer come through, is everything formatted correctly, can this get out on time; but things like that are somewhat controllable. Probably the biggest challenge is questioning yourself. Is this good enough? Will people like it? If it's not funded, is that a testament to how much I suck? Getting over the emotional risk and challenge to publishing a comic book is the first step to success. And I feel by even writing that last sentence, I have begun that step.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Updates!
Files for the comic are at the printer, ready to go to pre-press. Paperback novels for those receiving physical novels all ordered and on their way to me!
Digital Rewards
For those receiving ONLY digital rewards ($1 and $3 tier), those rewards will be going on in the next couple of days. So keep an eye out in your Inbox, or heavens-to-Betsy, your Spam folder.
Surveys

We hit the first stretch goal. Now let's see if we can get another one! I added 2 more stretch goals that include postcard and poster art of the cover. The postcards would be for EVERYONE who's pledged, and the poster art for those who pledged to get a physical copy ($7 and up).
I also added a couple Retailer Rewards. If you or know someone who's a retailer and would like to sell Lilacs, there are 2 rewards ($25 & $50) just for you/them! Get bulk quantities to sell however you want!

This update is coming just a short time after the last one. Why? BECAUSE WE ARE 100% FUNDED! It was an outstanding week and generous day! I throw out a HUGE thank you to everyone who's backed, shared, or even just watched the video or read about the project.
I'll be adding some stretch goals tomorrow to keep this rolling for the next 3 weeks, but for now, sit back, grab whatever you drink, and enjoy the fact Lilacs will be alive and breathing in a print run very, very soon!

We had a great 1st day, right?

When we hit the halfway point, I will also post a hi-res version of the back cover, which is just as beautiful as the front. Sofia Hagen did both covers for the comic. When $300 is also hit, I will post some stretch goals! (Additional rewards are coming, just working out a few details...)

campaign.story:
QUICK AND DIRTY KICKSTARTER WAS SUCCESSFULLY FUNDED AND THE GAME ENTERED PRODUCTION!
WANT THE GAME? FIND WHERE TO GET IT AT: www.qndgames.com
Simply the most outrageous fun you’ll have with friends at your next party. It’s an offensively fun card game that rewards quick wits and dirty minds. Suitable for ages 17+, Quick And Dirty is easy to learn and a typical game takes between 10-30 minutes. Players can join and leave at any time and it supports a virtually unlimited amount of players with no slowdown in the game at all!
It’s the perfect addition to liven up your next party, games night or pregame. Our game is even small enough to fit in your pocket or purse, so you can easily play it at a bar or take it travelling with you. We even made a waterproof plastic version that’s perfect for the pool, beach, or spilling drinks on! So get some friends together, maybe some drinks too, open Quick And Dirty and let the good times roll…
A category card and a letter card get flipped over. First to say an answer starting with the letter that fits the category wins the round! Give the round winner the black card to keep score, then flip two new cards to do it all over again. The champion is whoever has the most black cards at the end of the game.
Quick And Dirty is a social game, there are no strict right or wrong answers and part of the fun is justifying why your answer is correct. A typical game finishes once all the black cards have been played, but you can play for as long, or as little as you like. Because each round comprises both a category card and a letter card, our regular game deck gives you over 1000 unique round combinations to play through, meaning you can play for hours without the game repeating itself.
We encourage you to play the game however you like, but you can check out our suggested rules for social or competitive play on our website at: http://www.quickanddirtygames.com/rules 
We came up with the idea over a year ago. Whenever we had friends over we liked to play games, but we ran into some common issues:
some people didn’t know how to play 
games would slow down with too many players 
people became distracted
games took too long to finish 
not enough social interaction
None of the games we played were quite perfect so we decided to make our own. The result was Quick And Dirty. 
The original idea started on handwritten scraps of paper. Quick readability was important for a fair game, so we ended up deciding 4 sided cards worked best. We then experimented printing some of our categories onto cardboard at a local print shop, and it was starting to feel like a real game! By now we’d received encouraging feedback from everyone who played and began to think about how we could turn it into an actual polished game.
We racked our brains to come up with about 250 potential categories between us, but found that not all of them worked well in the game. To be a good category it had to have a wide range of possible answers, be easily answered with a single word or short phrase, and most of all lead to funny responses! So out of our initial 250 potential categories, only about 1 in 10 would meet our criteria for a good category. We then reached out to writers and paid to have over 500 more potential categories made for us. After thoroughly evaluating all the potential categories and exhaustive playtesting, we came up with the best 42 categories you see in this deck!
The many stages of prototypes
After settling on our categories, we then tested a series of different card designs to find which worked best. Everything from the logo shading on the card, to line widths and placement, to the font type used. We worked with printers to get professional prototypes made, including custom storage boxes, prepared graphical instruction cards, formalized the rules, and ended up with something beyond what we ever could have imagined at the start.

The last phase has been preparing to bring it to market, we had to set up a company, website, and film the Kickstarter video you see here today, as well as determine pricing, costs and the logistics of how we would fulfill a successful Kickstarter. All our hard work has finally come to this and we hope it brings you as much fun as we had creating it!




We’ve worked with printers and designers over the last year to develop a production ready prototype. After playtesting many iterations and hundreds of categories, the game is now 100% complete and ready to go. In order to bring the game to market we need to commit to a sufficient size production run, which is why we need your help. If we achieve our Kickstarter funding target we can put the game into production and get copies into your hands within weeks of the campaign ending!
Our cards will be professionally printed 3.5”x3.5” squares with their own custom compact tuck box. Our printers also specialize in Kickstarter fulfillment services and will be assisting us with shipping and fulfillment worldwide, which is how we are able to provide cheap postage to US customers and only a small additional fee for customers worldwide. EUROPEAN UNION CUSTOMERS NOTE: THERE WILL BE NO ADDITIONAL CUSTOMS/TAXES FOR YOU TO PAY ON DELIVERY. WE PAY THE VAT! We also have friendly shipping to Australia/Canada with no hidden fees.
Back us today with full confidence that you’ll be enjoying Quick And Dirty in the very near future!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our main risk would be a delay in delivery due to issues at our printing company or delivery networks. In the event of catastrophic issues with our primary printing company, we have an alternate supplier in place and will be able to fulfill orders with only minimal additional delays.

A note for EU customers: in order to facilitate EU friendly shipping and deal with customs and VAT complications we need to use a third party mail forwarding service in Europe. This will add an extra step to the shipping process and may mean slightly delayed delivery for EU customers relative to other countries.

Also in the event both of us are killed, maimed, kidnapped or otherwise incapacitated we regretfully will not be able to fulfill our Kickstarter. Sorry.

campaign.story:
PLAY

The Perfect BED SHELF
Whether you have a night stand, don't have a night stand, share a room together or have limited floor space, we have a solution to the common problems many of us have: EZ SMART SHELF -- A multi-function space-saving bed shelf with embedded WIRELESS ELECTRONIC DEVICE CHARGING station, versatile drink holder, LED night light, reading light and flashlight ALL IN ONE! Perfect for charging your phone and keeping personal items within reach. Wireless charging helps mobile devices become more energy efficient and sustainable while reducing the number of disposable cables and batteries.
EZ SMART SHELF consists of an eco-friendly solid acrylic surface material with an NSF food rating. The embedded wireless charging station is UL approved; accompanied by a 60 lumens battery operated LED light (batteries included!); and a removable flush-mount drink holder that prevents spills and accommodates a wide variety of beverages.
PLAY

We created a Safe, Reliable, and Multi-functional product that is simple to use, made of high quality materials and components that compliments surrounding furniture -- keeping personal items within reach, offering a secure placement for drinks, versatile lighting functions and a wireless electronic device charging station making this a space-saving all in one solution to traditional nightstands, lamps and coasters.
PLAY

It's all about convenience. Having a dedicated place to keep your personal items and charge your electronic devices is a welcomed perk. EZ Smart Shelf is the perfect space-saving solution for people in limited spaces or anyone experiencing “battery anxiety”. Our ALL IN ONE shelf product is lightweight and portable – perfect for the bedroom, college dorm, apartments, RV's, hotels or vacation homes. Once you experience your personal wireless charging station, you will wonder how you ever lived without it.
Our shelf surface material has a high resistance to everyday stains, chemicals, scratches and heat with the look and durability similar to that of natural stone. The shelf platform has a ASTM E 84 flame rating -- it's considered the gold standard in building materials flame ratings. Normal cleaning only requires soap and water or damp cloth with mild cleanser.
LEED® Certified
Our product’s platform is renewable, can be recycled at the end of its life, and features up to 35% certified pre-consumer recycled material. EZ SMART SHELF’s solid surface offers high performance and environmental benefits and can contribute to LEED® MR Credits 4.1 and 4.2 for recycled content, resulting in a reduction of industrial waste and energy consumption utilized during the manufacturing process. Made from high quality acrylic ingredients, the acrylic solid surface is GREENGUARD Indoor Air Quality Certified® for low emissions; NSF/ANSI Standard 51-certified to the highest level for food contact, for food of all types, and is certified by the U.S. Green Building Council and the Scientific Certification Systems (SCS).
Explore a new simple way to charge your electronic devices. Battery life is a major problem now that smartphones and other devices are being used to do more and more. EZ SMART SHELF is an innovative solution that offers freedom and convenience with wireless charging technology embedded into our shelf surface. You can wirelessly charge any make, model or manufacturer’s Qi compatible device by simply placing it on top of the EZ SMART SHELF surface. The rate of charge automatically reduces once the battery is full to prevent damage and to extend battery life. The wireless charging unit maintains a safe transfer of power with built-in high voltage and overheating detection. EZ SMART SHELF’s embedded wireless charging technology is UL and FCC Standard Certified for international safety guidelines, and simply plugs into a standard 110 volt wall outlet. International outlets more than likely will require a plug adapter.
PLAY

EZ SMART SHELF -- A Simple, Safe and Smarter Way to Charge. Inductive charging allows the consumption of electricity to be minimal, providing a low cost, low maintenance surface solution for safe power transfer compared with the traditional cable-based contact method. Wireless charging helps mobile devices become more energy efficient and sustainable while reducing the number of disposable cables and batteries.
HOW IT WORKS
Simply place it on the ez Smart Shelf surface.
1. Place your phone or other compatible electronic device onto the EZ Smart Shelf surface, ensure proper alignment and let the charging begin.
2. The battery indicator of your device will change to charging status after a good connection is made.
The embedded wireless charger is compatible with the Qi universal standard for wireless charging of battery operated mobile devices. Many of today’s cell phones come equipped with Qi compatibility. Older devices that do not have a Qi receiver built in can buy compatible Qi charging receivers to retrofit their phones compatibility. Receiver accessory types consist of a Built In Case, Apple Lightening Plug, Battery Cover, Flip Cover, Receiver Coil (external), Receiver Coil (internal), Universal Android Clip, Universal Dongle, iPhone 5/6 Clip.
How Qi Inductive Charging Works
The wireless power transfer occurs through electromagnetic induction. With inductive charging, electricity is transmitted wirelessly through the use of electromagnetic fields instead of traditional cables.
The principle is simple. The Qi enabled EZ SMART SHELF surface houses a transmitter coil that transfers energy to your phone through a receiver coil. The alternating current in the transmitter generates a magnetic field that resonates with the receiver and induces voltage powering the wireless charging technology.
Removable push-button battery operated light
The 60 lumens LED Light is powered by (3) AAA batteries (included!), and turns on/off with a simple downward push. The Night Light serves a useful purpose of illumination without leaving your bed. LED bulbs shine bright and are made to last for years. The LED light fits snug inside EZ Smart Shelf and is made for easy removal and reattachment when used as a reading light or flashlight.
Holds a wide variety of beverages
The removable flush-mount recessed drink holder accepts a wide variety of beverages with molded in stand-offs on the bottom of the holder to help prevent condensation build-up and keep containers from sticking to the bottom. Remove the beverage holder to accommodate larger taper shaped cups, mugs, glasses, wine glasses and containers whose top dimensions are 3" or more in diameter. Receptacles can be used to extend the Smart Shelf’s storage capabilities by allowing personal items and larger items like eye glasses, remote controls, jewelry and various other items to be stored.
OUR STORY
In short, our story is a simple one The President of Smart Shelf invented the product concept from a terrible experience that happened not once, but twice… With no nightstand in his modest sized room, he used to place his glass of water on the window sill with his phone plugged in on the floor. One night he reached for a glass of water to quench his thirst and accidentally spilled it on the floor, damaging his cell phone. That’s when he decided to get a nightstand. The second time it happened, he reached for a glass of water in the middle of the night -- it spilled and damaged his cell phone along with the items and finish on his nightstand. Each incident was a costly disaster. Out of frustration and the need to correct the problem, an idea was born. Once shared with family and friends, we knew we had a novel idea.
For the past year and a half, we have been working with dozens of people perfecting the idea for the perfect solution. It was important to create something effortless to install, easy to use; environmentally friendly; and something convenient and reliable enough to securely keep a phone, and hold a drink in place. The journey has been long perfecting our product, but we wanted to make sure we did everything right. We applied for a patent early last year, and we put a lot of work into designing and building the first prototypes. We recently completed our pre-production runs and our EZ Smart Shelf is now ready for production.
WE NEED YOUR HELP!
With your help, we can purchase the needed quantities of raw materials at volume prices and meet the minimum requirements needed to go into production.
If you would like to help us achieve our goal, please donate to this campaign. HELP SPREAD THE WORD! After you complete your transaction, Kickstarter will give you the option to send a message to your friends and followers on Facebook and Twitter. This message will inform your friends that you just backed “EZ SMART SHELF” and will include a link to our campaign page (you'll be able to edit the text). Please send these messages! It only takes a second and it'll be a huge help! ***THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!***
YOUR SUPPORT
Why become an EZ Smart Shelf backer?
We are a small start-up company, and launching a new product requires a lot of resources and funds up front. With your support we can ramp up for production, purchase raw materials at volume pricing, and place a production order large enough to produce the shelf at an affordable price. In return, you would be helping us make our product a reality in the marketplace and we’d love to give you one of the first SMART SHELFS to hit the market.
Production
Once the Kickstarter campaign is funded, we will send out backer surveys to gather your reward choices and shipping addresses. Upon receiving most of the surveys back, we’ll purchase our materials and commence production. Based on the manufacturer’s estimates, this process should take about 45-60 days to complete dependent upon volume.
Manufacturing
We have great relationships with our manufacturing partners strategically located in metro-Detroit and Denver; both who have a proven ability to deliver. Having manufactures strategically located in both the midwest and western regions helps with shipping and delivery depending on the origins of the orders. To ensure that every shelf is created to standard and delivered on time, we will be maintaining constant and personal contact with the manufacturers during the entire production process. Once the production is completed, we will ship the products to our backers.
Any pledge amount brings us closer to our goal of bringing our novel product to market. Please click the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or help us spread the word by sharing this page with everyone you know. With your help we can be the next success story!

OUR TEAM
We are an interdisciplinary team of people focusing on quality product development. We spent a lot of time and money securing our idea, and have filed multiple claims on our patent that will be paving the way for future products we have in mind. Our vision is focused on novel ideas offering simplistic innovation with the intent to bring quality, reliable, and innovative products to market, integrating today’s technology into a problem solving product. We have prior experience bringing products to market, so we are confident in our ability to complete product development on time.
With technical, manufacturing, legal, marketing and sales in place, we have assembled a skilled team, have perfected our products and we are ready to take the next steps. Now we are targeting production together with the Kickstarter community.
SMART SHELF FAQ's
How does it work?
Slides under mattress & cushioned furniture. Wireless charging unit plugs into any standard wall outlet.
What type of batteries does the LED light use?
3 AAA batteries (included with purchase).
What types of beverages fit in the drink holder?
Most standard size cups, glasses, cans and bottles fit in the drink holder. To accommodate larger sizes, simply remove the drink holder and drop larger any size cups, glasses, tumblers, travel mugs and wine glasses that are tapered shaped and wider than 3” diameter at the top.
Do I need to plug the transmitter in?
Yes, the transmitter needs to be plugged into a standard electrical wall outlet. International outlets will more than likely require a plug adapter.
Is the transmitter itself hard wired?
Yes, the transmitter is hard wired with AC adapter.
How do I know if my phone is compatible with EZ Smart Shelf?
Almost all phones are compatible to wireless charging. Some phones come with Qi compatibility. In some instances you may need to buy a compatible adapter. Google your type of phone to see if your phone is Qi compatible. Many adapters and cases are Qi wireless compatible for a variety of phones.
Where can I purchase a compatible receiver?
If your older phone is not Qi compatible, a Qi compatible receiver can be purchased through Amazon or E-bay.
How long is the cord that is supplied with EZ Smart Shelf?
Approximately 5 FT
Will using EZ Smart Shelf disrupt any of my other wireless devices such as internet, home security, etc.?
Using EZ Smart Shelf will not disrupt other wireless devices.
Can I use my phone while it's charging?
You can use your phone while it's charging as long as the phone is located on the charging area. Your speaker function will be required.
Can I charge multiple phones at the same time?
You cannot charge multiple phones at the same time using EZ Smart Shelf.
Will EZ Smart Shelf charge other devices like tablets or laptops?
Yes there are devices that are Qi compatible. Check your device for compatibility.
What is the warranty on EZ Smart Shelf?
ONE full year limited warranty is provided for EZ Smart Shelf.
Can I purchase the transmitter for EZ Smart Shelf separately?
You cannot purchase the transmitter separately.
Is EZ Smart Shelf safe for my health?
Yes, EZ Smart Shelf is not harmful as it is FCC certified.
What is Qi Standard?
Qi standard is a global wireless charging standard that enable wireless charging among Qi compatible devices. All Qi compatible devices, regardless of manufacturer or brand will charge wirelessly when placed on Qi wireless charging area.

updates.update_userinfo: EZ Smart Shelf Wireless Charging – Perfect for Tiny Bedrooms or Tiny Homes
updates.update_content:
Lately I have been getting very frustrated with the size of our bedroom. There is barely enough room for our bed and the dressers. I have no room for any type of bedside table or anything. I use my phone as an alarm clock, white noise machine etc… But I need to plug it in on the complete other side of the room near the door – which means when that alarm goes off I am dashing across the room so no one else wakes up!
Additionally, we camp seasonally in an RV and that master bedroom has even less room! I have to leave my phone on the floor when it is charging – along with everything else that is on the floor due to lack of space – so what am I supposed to do?

updates.update_userinfo: A portion of our donations will help support the Flint Water Fund
updates.update_content:
WE ARE A MICHIGAN BASED COMPANY, and we like to help our neighbors in times of need. As many have probably heard or have seen on the news, the city of Flint is dealing with a water crisis that has become well documented on the national news. 
The Flint water crisis is a drinking water contamination crisis in Flint, Michigan, United States that started in April 2014. After Flint changed its water source from treated Detroit Water and Sewerage Department water (which was sourced from Lake Huron as well as the Detroit River) to the Flint River (to which officials had failed to apply corrosion inhibitors), its drinking water had a series of problems that culminated with lead contamination, creating a serious public health danger. The corrosive Flint River water caused lead from aging pipes to leach into the water supply, causing extremely elevated levels of the heavy metal. In Flint, between 6,000 and 12,000 children have been exposed to drinking water with high levels of lead and they may experience a range of serious health problems.[1] The water change is also a possible cause of an outbreak of Legionnaires' disease in the county that has killed 10 people and affected another 77. [2] (source: )

We have expanded our Rewards tier to include another one of our products; EZ Drink Shelf. This shelf operates much in the same way by easily sliding under mattresses or cushioned furniture. With its ease and portability, it not only functions as a drink shelf, it can also be used as a mini Bed Shelf to house your personal bedside items (phone, remote, jewelry, eye glasses, etc.), and of course your drink!  The EZ Drink Shelf accommodates a wide variety of cups, cans, glasses and bottles... remove the drink holder to accept larger glasses, wine glasses, tumblers or travel mugs!

updates.update_userinfo: Doing our part to help the planet.
updates.update_content: Helping do our part in being eco-friendly is always on the forefront of our mind. That’s why we chose to create a quality product with a purpose. EZ Smart Shelf is not only made with eco-friendly processes and materials, it also helps save the planet from all the old, outdated, damaged and replaced charging cords and adapters from being tossed into landfills... not to mention saving you money from having to periodically purchase new charging cords when one wears out or you switch phones. With EZ Smart Shelf, there is no need for special cords. Our shelf charges all Qi compatible phones without the need of a cord. If you're like me, you have probably replaced your cord more times than you can count which virtually would have paid for an EZ Smart Shelf anyway.So we see this as a win/win opportunity.

campaign.story: Hi. I’m a singer-songwriter, a high school history teacher and a single parent. Things are, generally speaking, pretty good. I have done a lot of cool things in my life. I coach soccer and used to chase storms on the Great Plains (before it became big business and reality TV fodder). I wait tables and bartend on the weekends to help with the bills. In the early-1980s, while in college, I warmed up for Tracy Chapman a couple of times at local coffeehouses. My ultimate dream - other than being a good father - is to not simply go on tour (I went on tour last summer and netted -$3500. Whoops.), but to go on tour in the spring and summer(s), to play tiny venues (coffee shops, bookstores, libraries, etc.), and to see people mouthing the words to my songs as I perform. That’s the holy grail for me. The reason I am trying to raise money in this venue is because, in order to reach potential fans these days, musicians need to pay for advertising on social media sites (Facebook, etc.). I’m not going to make much money selling my albums: the industry doesn’t work that way anymore. Someone buys an album for $5 and shares mp3 files with friends. Frankly, I’m OK with that. I just want people to hear my music. But I really can’t afford the kinds of social media campaigns that will, perhaps eventually, help me build a big enough fan base to reach my goal; the goal of people singing my songs with me. Thanks for reading.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
One risk is that my social media campaigns fail. Another is that, despite gaining a solid fan base, touring still loses money. (Tough to lose money when you're a single dad.) One final risk: my music isn't good. I think I write good songs. Others do as well. Maybe they're just being nice. :)
