campaign.story:
How to use 2VR
1. Purchase 2VR.   
2. Download some of the amazing apps, most are free, from your App Store. See our Content section below for some of our favorites!
3. Insert your smart phone into 2VR, place on your face, enter a new world, and enjoy!
Stimuli 
Here at stimuli, we believe virtual reality is the next big platform in multimedia and digital exploration. So why isn’t it accessible to everyone, anywhere? We believe it should be, introducing 2VR.
Hands-free
What sets 2VR apart? We noticed, especially with lower market headsets, we were still missing a beautiful hands free, mobile headset. Having access to VR at any moment is crucial to bringing content to users. This inspired us to create, 2VR, a mobile headset that is beautiful, economical, and fits in your pocket.
Fits in your pocket.
2VR
With 2VR, we believe, you can be everywhere, anywhere you are. The sleek and stylish design makes it easy to view the latest VR content with any phone. 
2VR is compatible with any VR or AR content, and easily fits any iPhone or Android, and most importantly 2VR allows you to view hands free. 
What makes this possible are specially designed ear grips that comfortably balance the phone on your face. Being hands-free truly allows you to immerse yourself in the content.
Follow these easy steps to enjoy breath-taking VR:


Content
There are so many amazing virtual reality apps being released, check out some of our favorite below.
New York Times VR

Vrse - Virtual Reality

Homido 360 VR player

Google Cardboard
Discovery VR

VR ONE Cinema

and many many more! Check out your app store for even more virtual content.



Phone Sizes
2VR safely hold all phones 4.7" to 6". This includes iPhone 6, and most Android devices.
Phone Safety
 Safe to up and down.
2VR was designed to safely hold your phone, with grips to keep your phone in place. It is recommended that you keep your head level and not tilt your head side to side, but up and down.
Rewards
We want to get virtual reality into as many hands as possible. Because we believe VR has not yet reached its true user potential, we are offering our patent pending, 2VR at special Kickstarter prices. We are offering our base model for only $25, including shipping in the US.
Schedule  
We need your help to ramp up production and put in a minimum order to keep unit cost to a minimum. Currently we are refining the final design and packaging with our manufacturer. And estimating shipping within a few months. 
Thank you for your support, we are very excited about this product, and we are excited to share it with you, and the world. 
If you like 2VR, please like and share our Facebook and Instagram.
Video, editing, and production beautifully done by John Lackmeyer.
Thank you.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Please note, 2VR does not include a smart phone. 

Please use 2VR responsibly, be aware of your surroundings while using 2VR. It is recommended that you are seated while using ANY virtual reality device.

Phone safety is extremely important to us. While 2VR will hold most phone cases, it is recommended that the user limit swift movements while using any VR headset to ensure the phone remains in place.

We are estimating reward delivery by June 2016. If this were to change, we will be sure to update backers as soon as possible.

We are optimizing the final design, and we will update our backers each step of the way. We can assure you that we are interested in creating the highest quality headset possible.

We know without our backers this would not be possible, we promise to be as transparent as possible and address any changes that may occur.

campaign.story:
Legendary Worlds is a revolutionary adult coloring book that will take you on an amazing journey to castles in the sky, crystal caves, underwater realms and even into outer-space.
This ultimate coloring book is being created by a group of seven artists including Witek Radomski, Carrie Wong, Kamala Melzack, Matthew Dorad, Al Sayers, Nony Dar Sagol, and Anonymous Goat.
Lush Paradise by Matthew Dorad
Bug Rider by Kamala
 Legendary Worlds (Details): 
Printed in Canada
Priced in Canadian Dollars
85 beautifully illustrated pages
12 x 12 inches
Printed on high quality paper
Sewn-bound so it lays flat
Stretch Goals: 
$10,000 - Increases the book to 85 Illustrated pages REACHED!
$12,500 - Every reward level gets the PDF + 1 extra page added to the PDF REACHED!
$20,000 - 3 unique postcards included with EVERY physical order. If you order 10 books you will receive 12 postcards (4 sets of 3 designs). These colorable postcards will be from the artwork in Legendary Worlds. REACHED!
$21,500 - The printable PDF reward delivered to each backer will be increased from 4 to 5 wonderful images.
$23,000 - Every single Kickstarter backer will receive ANOTHER printable coloring pack called "Legendary Horrors" that will be delivered in May 2016.
$25,000 - All backers will get a digital download of an exclusive video by Carrie and Witek showing you how to use vibrant coloring techniques and lighting to create stunning works of art.
Treehouses by Witek
We need your support to bring this book to the finish line and into book stores around the world. We are working tirelessly to create the most remarkable and detailed book that will take you on an awesome artistic adventure. By funding this project, we will be able to print and deliver your books and rewards by April 2016.
Turtles by Anonymous
Legendary Landscapes: Our previous book 
Legendary Landscapes was our first adult coloring book, published in November 2015 and funded through Kickstarter. The book was highly acclaimed by colorists in North America and around the world. We were featured on Canadian TV and in radio interviews, and the book is now carried by hundreds of book stores and we've received colored pages from thousands of people!
Legendary Worlds will be bound and printed on the same high-quality paper we are known for in Legendary Landscapes. The book is large and it's a joy to color on. We've done our research and the paper is lovely with water-based felt markers such as Tombow, Faber-Castell, and Crayola without bleeding through the page. Fans of our books have reported that watercolor pencils also work beautifully, and the paper has a perfect tooth for colored pencils.
Pictures from Legendary Worlds
Sting Rays by Nony
Quartz Palace by Witek
Hummingbird by Carrie
Inking in progress
Junkyard Robot by Witek
Space Octopus by Anonymous
Make a pledge to get this book or the other great rewards, and bring these worlds to life!

campaign.story:
One Premium Cable Cable $22 CAD = $15.33 USD 
Introducing Lux Cable's Premium Charging Cable.
Available in both Micro USB and Lightning!
Supports: 
iPhone 5/5c/5s/6/6+/6s/6s+ 
iPad mini/mini 2/mini 3/mini 4/Air/Air 2/
iPad Pro
or 
Android/Windows Phones and Tablets (Our cable also supports Quick Charge 2.0 !)
We've heard numerous complaints about charging cables:
They are too short! 
They break too easily! 
They are cheaply made!
Here are Lux Cables we wantto change things with our premium charging cable.
What makes us different? 
We want to change the charging cable game. We've created a luxurious cable that will match the expensive devices that we use daily. We spend hundreds of dollars on a phone only to use a cheaply made cable, that doesn't make sense to us!
Our cable is 2 meters long. Perfect for charging while reading or when you are too far away from a power outlet. Double the length of most cables included with your devices! 
Our cable is inspired by paracord or parachute cord. It is covered by a thick nylon material, making your cable stronger and looking much better! 
Our cable has metal tips and is at least 25% thicker than most other cables, keeping your cable long lasting. No more dreaded splitting or bent ends.
Our Lighting cables are MFI Certified, allowing you to use our cables with all of your Apple devices.
Our Micro USB cables support Quick Charge 2.0! Allowing you to use all of your phones charging features. (20AWG for lower resistance and faster charging than a budget cable). This allows you to charge your phone faster than conventional charging. 
Our cables will include a one year warranty, and we are looking to extend this warranty! Rest assured that you will have a premium cable with a guarantee.
We will be looking at additional ways to continually improve our cable as we grow! Your feedback is appreciated. Let us know if you have any ideas on how to improve our project and make our cable even more luxurious.
A collection of talent from Vancouver, BC Canada
Creators:
Jeremy and Hugh - Two life long friends with a dream. Creators of the Lux Cable. Dreams of owning a start up, and giant fans of crowd funding. 
Campaign Creation:
Reilly Renwick - Kickstarter Expert - (Expertly managed other campaigns and brought them to success)
Alex Bocajj - Creative Genius - bocajj.com
Why we need your pledge:
Help us bring our product from our mind to your home. 
We at Lux Cables have spent our due diligence making a plan to provide the most luxurious cable available. Why do we need your donation?
We have a MOQ (Minimum Order Quantity) to meet. If we receive $5,000 CAD in donations we will be able to make our creation a reality. 
Quality is key - We need to meet this MOQ to make sure our product is created by the best manufacturer and so we don't lessen our quality like other cables out there. 
MFI Certified - We will be using campaign funds for our MFI licensing, allowing us to use the "Made for iPod/iPad/iPhone Logo"
We have prepared for our campaign by finding suitable manufacturers, testing multiple prototypes, and creating the best finished product we imaged. This saves us time and avoids potential delays in fulfilling our rewards. 
January - February  - Kickstarter funding.
March - April - Production and final testing.
May - Shipping to all of our backers worldwide.
Send us a message at hello@luxcables.com or through Kickstarter and we will get back to you as soon as possible. 
We welcome any feedback and further improvements recommended by our backers!
Click to Share us on Facebook!
                  Help spread the word.
Make some noise about our campaign! Tell your friends and make sure to share our project. Your funds will go towards accelerating production and making further improvements to our cable!
Thank you from all of us at Lux Cables.

campaign.story:
As seen on 
Capata is the project of a young creator passioned of outdoor and last minute adventures. From a simple idea, the label offers a range of useful and design products for adventurers, travelers, or surfers. We realized that a multifunctional sleeping bag was missing. A design and technical sleeping bag which helps his user to use it with many ways. That’s why we invente the World's Most Functional Sleeping Bag : the Lazysack™. We create a poncho with removable hood, outdoor blanket and a technical sleeping bag. Your contribution will help us to carry on our project in the best conditions. You'll allow our team to carry on Capata Pyrenees to create and offer new colors and products in the future, always in a spirit of adventure and a continuous care of design.
___
Capata est avant tout le projet d'une jeune créatrice passionnée d'outdoor et des aventures de dernière minute. A partir d'une idée simple Capata crée des produits utiles et design destinés à tous les nomades, les voyageurs ou encore les surfeurs. Nous avons réalisé qu'il manquait un sac de couchage multi fonctions, mêlant mode et technicité, qui permette à son utilisateur de s'en servir de différentes façons. C’est pour cela que nous avons créé l'un des sacs de couchage les plus fonctionnels : le Lazysack™: à la fois sac de couchage technique, poncho doté d’une capuche amovible et couverture outdoor. Votre contribution va nous aider à poursuivre notre projet dans les meilleures conditions. Vous permettrez à notre team de mener à bien Capata pour créer et vous proposer dans le futur de nouveaux coloris et produits, toujours dans un esprit d'aventure et un souci design permanent.
We follow a real development process to create our Lazysack™. At first, we thought and thought about details, colors and materials which can make the difference and be sure that it will be a make-able sleeping bag. Finally, after doing « monsters » we found the good compromise and we made about a lot of samples. We did tests into the wild and approve what we wanted in adequacy with ours values and ours desires : a well thought, design and technical sleeping bag. Our sleeping bag is unisex and made for all heights. 
__
/X\   CONCEPT  /X\
Nous avons suivi un processus de développement sérieux pour créer notre Lazysack™. Au départ, nous avons pensé et repensé les détails, les coloris et les matières afin de faire toute la différence et être sûrs de faire un sac de couchage réalisable. Finalement, après fabrication de prototypes "maison" nous avons trouvé le bon compromis et avons fait des échantillons. Nous avons également fait des tests grandeur nature et décidé de ce que nous voulions en adéquation avec nos valeurs et nos envies : un sac de couchage bien pensé, design et technique. Notre sac de couchage est unisexe et est créé pour tout type de taille.
Conscious about ecological problems, we choose to produce Eco fabric, to respect the environment. Contrary to ours competitors of sleeping bags, we choose quality superior Premium 210T Polyester. Designed with Durable Water Repellent technology, our Lazysack™ lets water slide on the surface to let the Lazysack™dry. The filling of our Lazysack™ is made of synthetical fiber which allows to be warm because we estimate that even ducks have the right to keep warm ( and keep theirs feathers !) . We called this 3D fiber« Xwarmfiber », a technology which allows to keep the warmth into the Lazysack™ using the best insulator in the market. The comfort temperature is 46 degrees Fahrenheit ; the limit temperature is 39 degrees Fahrenheit and the temperature risk is 15 degrees Fahrenheit.  And to be sure you’ll have the biggest comfort during your lazy trip, we added an anti cold flap. To finish we put the best quality zippers to guarantee the better durability of opening and closing possible. 
____
/X\   CARACTERISTIQUES  /X\
Conscients des problèmes écologiques, nous avons choisi de fabriquer notre Lazysack™ sous le label Eco Fabric, permettant ainsi de respecter l’environnement. Contrairement à nos concurrents, nous avons choisi le 210T Polyester Premium de qualité supérieure. Conçu avec la technologie DWR notre Lazysack™ laisse l’eau déperler sur sa surface pour laisser le Lazysack™ au sec. L’intérieur de notre Lazysack™ est constitué de fibres synthétiques qui permettent d’avoir bien chaud car nous estimons que même les canards ont le droit d’avoir chaud ( et de garder leurs plumes! ). Nous avons appelé cette fibre 3D « Xwarmfiber », une technologie qui permet de conserver la chaleur à l’intérieur du Lazysack™ en utilisant le meilleur isolant existant sur le marché. La température de confort se situe à 9 degrés ; la température limite se situe quant à elle à 4 degrés et enfin la température de risque est à -9 degrés. Et pour encore plus de chaleur, nous ajoutons un rabat anti-froid afin d’assurer au maximum à l’utilisateur un confort absolu. Pour finir nous mettons les meilleurs zips afin de garantir la meilleure longévité possible des ouvertures et fermetures.
                 Our goal is to make our project of Lazysack™, real. It means that we want to offer you the best design and qualitative product. We want you to enjoy a new way to explore the wild with our Lazysack™. If we succeed, you’ll help us to offer new colors and carry on the Capata project.
Stretch goals :
Our first stretch goal is 15 000 € to be the campaign a success. In this case, you’ll have the choice between the Royal Blue Lazysack™ or the Black Marble. if we reach 25 000 € we’ll make a new color : the Tomato Red. If we reach 50 000 €, the Inca Ritual with its colorful universe and inspired by the traditional poncho will come out. If we reach 100 000 €, it will be so awesome ! In this case, we’ll make a neutral and timeless color of the Lazysack™ : the Fog Grey! It will be amazing, no? And the icing on the cake, if we reach 150 000 € we’ll develop the Purple Swell, in the flashy and geometrical spirit of the 90’s.
____
/X\   NOTRE OBJECTIF   /X\
Notre objectif est de donner naissance à notre projet de Lazysack™. Nous voulons vous offrir un produit design et qualitatif. Nous voulons que vous découvriez une nouvelle sensation de liberté grâce à nos sacs de couchage. Si vous y parvenons vous nous aiderez à proposer de nouvelles couleurs et poursuivre le projet Capata.
Objectifs :
Notre premier objectif est de 15 000 € pour que la campagne soit un succès. Dans ce cas, vous aurez le choix entre le Lazysack™ Royal Blue ou le Black Marble. Si nous atteignons 25 000 € nous sortirons une nouvelle couleur : le Tomato Red . Si nous atteignons 50 000 € le Inca Ritual à l’univers coloré inspiré du traditionnel poncho verra le jour. Si nous parvenons à 100 000 €, ce serait génial ! Dans ce cas, nous créerons une couleur sobre et intemporelle pour le Lazysack™ : le Fog Grey! C'est pas une super idée ça ? Et cerise sur le gâteau, si nous atteignons 150 000 €, nous développerons le Lazysack™ Purple Swell, dans l’esprit flashy et géométrique des années 90.
                              Your contribution will allow us to make our first bulk production. If we reach our goal we will keep under control all steps of process choosing best quality fabrics and components and will do the best esthetic for the Lazysack™ . We divided the necessary requirements in the chart to explain easily where your pledge will go ( above ).  If we exceed our funding goal of 15 000 € we will invest on tooling for original graphic designs. And if we reach the others stretch goals we will be able to propose new fresh colors. As you can see you are the first building block of the Capata’s project. All contributions are very importants for us, it gives us force and proves that you trust our project as far as we.
___
/X\  FONDS  /X\
Votre contribution nous permettra de faire notre première production de masse. Si nous atteignons notre but nous aurons toutes les clés en main pour choisir des matériaux et des tissus de première qualité pour donner au Lazysack™ le meilleur design possible. Nous avons réparti les besoins nécessaires au développement du projet dans un graphique disponible ci-dessus pour expliquer clairement où iront vos dons. Si nous dépassons notre premier objectif de 15 000 € nous investirons dans des moules pour créer des designs originaux. Et si nous parvenons à atteindre les autres objectifs nous serons alors capables de proposer de nouveaux coloris. Comme vous l’aurez compris vous êtes la première pierre de l’édifice du projet Capata. Toutes les contributions sont très importantes pour nous, cela nous encourage et prouve que vous croyez au projet autant que nous.

campaign.story:
Have you ever imagined an amazing world in which your favorite characters finish each others' sentences?
EndQuotes is the party game that lets you mash up hundreds of unforgettable lines from movies, tv, songs, books, and more!
It’s the uproarious new card game where you “end” one quote with a phrase from another quote!
Your friends won't want to miss it. It’s like a choose-your-own-joke adventure!
EndQuotes brings together all the things we love about party games. It's a funny, fast-paced game for smart people with open minds. Too real? Too soon? Too shocking? Too suggestive? All of the above. Get ready to mash up the memes of our times – hand-curated text fragments up-cycled from the decadent circus of global culture.
EndQuotes features quotes from some of your favorite fictional & non-fictional figures – actors, activists, writers, comedians, politicians, and even cartoon characters.  We're suggesting players be 18+, since young minds are impressionable and these memes may leave lasting impressions.
EndQuotes cards are designed to create a huge variety of outrageous combinations. Just a few rounds of play will make your game night fantastically memorable, and the game makes a great gift too – but we need your help to make it a reality!
Each deck includes:  
500 professionally printed poker-size playing cards
Professionally printed box
Gameplay instructions
Join the Fun
Got favorite quotes? Fancy yourself a poet? We're here to help you fulfill your recent dream of being mildly internet famous! 
Follow @endquotesgame on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and Google+.  Sign up at www.endquotes.com for a chance to win cool prizes, including free games.
Share your own favorite quotes & creative ideas for "question & answer pairs" with #EndQuotes, to be included in our upcoming EndQuotes app AND (...if you're lucky...) in future expansion pack collectors’ editions! Play along with our themed contests! Like Lakoff and Johnson, we believe that "love is a collaborative work of art."
Thanks for your support, and please tell your friends about us!
What They're Saying
"...like Cards Against Humanity for smart people." ~ Adam G
_____
"Playing EndQuotes was hilarious! I hadn't laughed so hard in a long time. You won't believe some of the raunchy, yet oh-so-comical combinations you'll come up with in this game. Can't wait to play it again with friends and some libations, of course!" ~ Katie D
_____

Kickstarter fulfillment will be our first production run with a bulk printer, with whom we've formed a relationship, vetted quality, and negotiated a contract for the printing of the cards. A successful Kickstarter printing paves the way for many expansion decks to come!

updates.update_content:
Happy 2016 to all of our wonderful Kickstarter backers!    
We've been busy the past few weeks negotiating a final contract for the printing of the cards, and we're happy to announce that we've reached an agreement and the order has been placed.
Here's what's next. Over the next couple weeks, our printer will be developing a proof copy for our review before the cards go into mass production. The factory will be closed for Chinese New Year in early February. Afterward, the printer will have up to 35 days to complete printing and deliver the cards to the docks in Ningbo. It will likely take a day or two to get from there to Shanghai. Afterward, it should take about 14 days to ship from China to US (by freighter), and about another 7 days (via domestic shipping) to ship out to backers. Right now, we're probably looking at decks landing in the hands of backers sometime in April.

Hey folks,  
We're headed into the final hours of our Kickstarter campaign and thanks to our awesome backers we've reached our $4,000 goal!

Thanks again to everyone who has supported this campaign. Once we receive Kickstarter funds, we'll begin a production run with our manufacturer in China and your cards will be printed in the coming weeks.

campaign.story:
On December 11 and 12 Buddy the Elf comes to Wayne, NJ to find his real family and save Christmas for everyone!
With direction and choreography by Tony Mansker (Broadway's Mary Poppins) and Eddie Pendergraft (Broadway's Wicked) and Musical direction by Kathy Calahn (Broadway's Mary Poppins), 20 young performers bring to life this magical story and represent the Broadway Arts Lab Company's vision:  that through arts education- imagination, creativity, and uninhibited self-expression become the tools with which students begin their journey on the path of self-discovery.
Broadway Arts Lab Company is a nonprofit organization raising funds to help produce our first full scale main stage production go Elf Jr: The Musical and create funding for our year round services of training the next generation of Broadway performers.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our Challenge is to produce a Broadway style show for local New Jersey students!

As with any extra-curricular performing arts business, acquiring students is the first and most prevalent challenge. Marketing is an expensive venture, and also the key to acquiring new students. Other arts businesses such as dance studios and music schools also face this challenge. 

Our second challenge is being the "new kid on the block." We have been in business only two years, and while word is spreading and expansion is happening, we are in direct competition with other long-standing performing arts programs, which have their loyal market bases already established. 

Our third challenge is the cost of producing live theater. A budget for junior show can easily and quickly reach $20,000.00 or more. Broadway Arts Lab Company is dedicated to providing superior quality production values and high-end faculty, no less than what our young students deserve. With a budget of this size and in order to cover our costs, we need a large cast of students to make ends meet. Larger cast sizes help offset the cost of productions and simultaneously help keep tuition fees down, allowing more students access to the program.

campaign.story:
Hole 9, par 4, third stroke, 30 yards to the pin. Before you step up to strike the ball, you take a few practice swipes. Swing one, ti.ttle shows 52 yeards. Too long. Swing two, 17 yards. Too soft. Swing three, 29 yards. Go for it! With ti.ttle on your club, you know how your swing would do before you hit the ball.
1. Take a practice swing. 2. Check with ti.ttle if it's the right swing. 3. Go for it!
ti.ttle is a wearable golf swing analyzer that mounts on your club. It senses your practice swing without the ball and calculates the carry distance and various attributes of your shots as though you actually hit the ball. Aside from helping you with these short games situations, ti.ttle allows you to practice your swing anywhere anytime. 
Like a flight simulator helps pilots train without flying a plane, ti.ttle makes it possible for golfers to hone their game by getting the real-time feedback on the results of each practice swing. This allows you to practice your swing in the comfort of your home.
Also, ti.ttle connects via Bluetooth to your smart phone’s GPS and functions as a e-caddie on the course, pinpointing the distance left to the hole.
ti.ttle is a compact and powerful smart device that helps your game at practice and out on the course.
ti.ttle: A Flight Simulator for Golfers
 ti.ttle in the NEWS
• I want to improve my touch in the short game.
• I want to perfect my swing with every club.
• I don’t have the time to get out to the driving range often enough. 
• I want to practice in the comfort of my home. 
• I don’t want space-consuming and extravagant equipment cluttering my house. 
• I want a simple easy-to-use device that analyzes my swing with every club. 
• I want a versatile device that can also provide the course information as my e-caddie. 
ti.ttle is a smart and compact golf swing analyzer and an e-caddie all rolled into one. Many features are engineered into the intelligent little wearable device.
CARRY DISTANCE CALCULATOR
Immediately after a practice swing, ti.ttle calculates instantly the projected carry distance using an ingenious swing analysis algorithm. ti.ttle adapts to all club types—driver, wood, iron, wedge, and putter—to produce personalized and accurate swing data. After each practice swing, ti.ttle provides a real-time feedback by displaying the calculated carry distance on the device.  
Clubs Supported: Driver, Wood (3, 5, and 7), Long Iron (3 and 4), Middle Iron (5, 6, and 7), Short Iron (8 and 9), Wedge (Pitching wedge, Gap wedge, Sand wedge, and Lob wedge), and Putter.
REAL-TIME SWING ANALYSIS 
After you swing, click the button on your ti.ttle device to display real-time swing data. The data includes: projected carry distance, head speed, swing type, club Path, and face Angle.
The ti.ttle swing algorithm can analyze 9 different swing types: pull hook, pull, pull slice, draw, straight, tail away fade, push hook, push and push slice.
Using a 6-axis MEMs (microelectromechanical) sensor, this small unobtrusive device will break down your swing and give you an immediate feedback so you can adjust your shot tendencies as you practice.
You can display all the attributes of your last swing right on your ti.ttle device with just one tap. Double-tap to switch to golf course information.
GOLF COURSE GPS INFO.
When connected to your smartphone through Bluetooth low energy (“BLE”), the ti.ttle app displays golf course information for over 36,000 courses worldwide. The current hole number and remaining distance to the hole is displayed automatically on your ti.ttle device.
Search for the golf course by country or course name on the ti.ttle app. Select the golf course through the app and automatically track your location on the course through GPS. Customize course settings to choose tee box, green, pin and distance measuring unit.
INDIVIDUALIZED CLUB SETTINGS 
Personal calibration gives you even more accurate swing analysis for each of your clubs. Individual club settings can be configured using the ti.ttle app. Once configured, the customized swing analysis data appear directly on your ti.ttle device. The ti.ttle app is not necessary during practice.
Record and compare your average carry distance for each club type. Know precisely which club to grab when you take to the field by tracking average distances.
You can record your new personal best and track your progress with the ti.ttle app.
CONVENIENCE FEATURES (Call Decline & Digital Clock)
While on the course, don’t let the calls distract you from your game. Decline phone calls and check missed text messages on the go with a simple tap on your ti.ttle.
1. Preparation: Attach a cradle to each of your clubs and insert ti.ttle into the cradle.
2. App installation:  Download the ti.ttle app from Google Play or Apple App Store. After installing the app, pair ti.ttle with your smart phone via Bluetooth.
3. Calibration:  Calibrate ti.ttle with each of the clubs. Put ti.ttle in calibration mode, hit the ball in the field, and enter the carry distance in the app.
4. Practice:  Put ti.ttle in practice mode, and swing the club without hitting the ball.
ti.ttle usage: on the course
ti.ttle usage: at home
5. View the results: If you swing, ti.ttle will display your swing data immediately. Click the button to scroll through your swing info.
ti.ttle's TWO DIFFERENT PACKS - Basic & Master
• ti.ttle Basic Pack: ti.ttle device + 4 cradles (supports Driver, 7 iron, Putter & Gap wedge) 
• ti.ttle Master Pack: ti.ttle device + 16 cradles (supports ALL clubs: Driver, 3/5/7 Wood, 3-9 Iron, Putter, Sand wedge, Gap wedge, Pitching wedge & Lob wedge) 
Founded in 2001 in the Republic of Korea (ULIKE CREATIVE Inc., San Jose, USA), U-Like is a high-tech IT company specializing in IOE service and manufacturing innovative products. We are committed to user-centered service based on user research and extensive product testing!
Why are we Crowdfunding?
We are crowdfunding as a way to bring new and better products to the market faster. As a developer, we already have access to the tools to bring our product to life in a quick and efficient manner. However, to be able to introduce our product to a wider audience, we don't yet have the visibility or financial means.
We are also looking to the potential users of our product to provide meaningful feedback so that we can improve and fine-tune our current offering. We want to make the best, highest quality, and safest product possible, and only through the input of the public can we make this goal attainable. We feel that only by putting the reputation of our product into the hands of the consumer will we get a real feel for what we can do better. Finally, given all the help our consumers provide to us, we want to be able to offer the best prices possible during the campaign as a thank you to our buyers who are helping to support our development and refine our product.
Contact Us: tittle@ulike.co.kr
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Even though we have previous experience in the golf market, ti.ttle holds a deeper place in our hearts because it is the first product we have developed completely internally. Until now, we have cooperated with our company's partners and client but ti.ttle is unique in that it is the first golf product that is purely the result of the love and hard work of U-like. 

Since our company is focused on technological development and testing, we don't employ any marketing or promotion professionals. Therefore, we are concerned that we may not have done enough to promote a product that we are very proud of. 

Through consistent and thorough testing, we have confidence that ti.ttle will work as displayed in our campaign. However, as with any completely new product, there can be hurdles that need to be overcome in the mass-production phase. 

We are greatly looking forward to showing ti.ttle to our backers. We thank you so much in advance for your support.

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
We recently updated the ti.ttle manual on the ti.ttle app. In a step-by-step manner, we explain how to both set-up and use ti.ttle. We also offer up some helpful tips that we hope you will find useful. We hope this will help you in using ti.ttle to its full potential. The website links are listed below:
English: http://ti-ttle.com/html/support/app_en.html

Dear Backers,
As the last update this year, we’d like to deliver some guides on calibration to help you use ti.ttle better!
ti.ttle can be used without calibrating. However, ti.ttle default calibration is for amateur players. Thus, filling out individualized profile information is highly recommended for use with the basic settings. For more accurate club calibration, each club should be calibrated individually. However, when calibrating, ensure that ti.ttle is analyzing your swing properly. If you move ti.ttle before or while entering your initial distance, the device may mis-analyze your seeing. If ti.ttle saves this measurement inexact measurement, your personalized player profile may display significant variations.

campaign.story:
1) Made from premium components. We use the highest quality ballistic nylon. It's crafted to have a comfortable soft feel without sacrificing durability. The S+A bag uses Military grade zippers, contrasted with authentic full grain leather
2) Backed for a decade. Our passion is not just for design, but also for durability. We've tested this backpack so extensively that we're offering a 10 year warranty on the bag. It's built to last. Period.
3) Pure Functionality. This backpack doesn't only look amazing, it actually does amazing things. Subtle details, such as electronic safe packet and D rings, make the the S+A Backpack perfect for adventure, or work.
4) Offered Directly to You. By offering our jackets directly to you, we're able to remove the distributor and retailer and offer you a Backpack that would usually retail for $300+ at only $159.
Crafting quality dry goods has been more than a passion for us; it has become a lifestyle. Being design enthusiast, we began making beautiful quality denim in 2010. Since then, we've designed and produced shirts, hats and bags, with the focus being on aesthetics and durability. It's our mission to eliminate over priced fast fashion, and bring back quality dry goods at a reasonable price. With your help today, we can make this happen.
How is S+A so durable?
The Sea+Air backpacks is not only perfection in terms of engineering and production, but it's rich in its concept and quality. Unlike most other bags on the market, the 365 hat can sustain the sun, snow, and any weather in between. 
Using Ballistic Nylon and full grain leather, we were able to give the S+A bag a tough exterior without sacrificing aesthetics.Ballistic nylon is a thick, tough, synthetic nylon fabric used for a variety of applications. Ballistic nylon was originally developed by the DuPont corporation as a material for flak jackets to be worn by World War II airmen. The nylon is ideal for extreme weather conditions and heavy usage.
The quality of hardware on any item is crucial to its lifespan. We cut no corners in ensuring that our zippers would last. Everything from the zipper puller to the tape width have been tested to sustain heavy usage.
We used TSS to enforce all seams from ever falling apart. The sewing machine sews the first stitch, then it sews over that same stitch twice more before moving on to the second stitch. On the second stitch, it sews three times, then moves on to the third stitch.
Functionality
Bad weather can hit us anytime, and protecting our electronics can be a mission. With our unique water proof storage, you can rest easy. Keep your electronics and wallet safe from water damage on the river or in the field with this touchscreen-compatible pocket. This 7.5" x 7.5" TPU pouch features a Ziploc-style closure and a Velcro strip along the back, allowing for easy, secure fastening.
Add $25 for the 100% cotton S+A t-shirt
All logistics are in place to start production in December 2015. January we will be focusing on a very detailed production process. Delivery is scheduled for February 2016. The Sea+Air backpack is made to last you your lifetime, but are backing it up for a decade. If your backpack gets damaged due to construction, send it back and we will replace it. With your early support today, we'll use the funds to begin the production of the Sea+Air Travel collection.

White front lights ensure that you're visible to those coming toward you, red rear brake lights help avoid that critical rear end incident, and amber indicator lights alert drivers of your turns.
Our garments are being made by some of the finest manufactures in the world using some of the highest end performance textiles on the market. Of course, our secret sauce is our #ZeriUI, Bluetooth Low Energy, washable LED system, driven by a future proofed, patent pending application, but that’s the boring stuff. The cool part is, you will look great and feel good wearing it.
Our future proof garments controlled by the Lumenus app were designed to save your life while fitting your lifestyle. You no longer have to choose between style or safety, Lumenus blends these worlds by focusing on fit, fashion and performance while delivering the safest illumination solution ever developed.
By helping to back Lumenus you will be the first to receive the initial line, download the app, and get a significant savings. Our team has a track record of over delivering, it’s not our first rodeo, so kick back and relax for a second while you watch some videos, look at some pictures and explore our rewards.
                             Lumenus is smart clothing designed for cyclists, runner, or motorcyclist-- crossing over into any activity that needs (or wants) to Be Brighter! Our intuitive navigation system uses Google Maps (meaning it will work in over +100 countries worldwide!). Let the Lumenus software plan and track your routes.
We believe that technology should enhance and improve our connection with the world around us and not try to replace them. That is why we've worked tirelessly on the advanced "Zero UI" system that means your phone can be tucked safely away and you still get all the amazing features.
We're ourselves are commuter cyclists, runners, and outdoor enthusiasts who wanted to approach the problem from an intelligent design philosophy. ￼￼ Safety products are too often limited to accessories that are meant for just a single use or activity. Bike lights are meant only for biking, running lights need to be charged separately and motorcycle lights are often not enough on their own. Reflective alone doesn't do you justice when a car isn't approaching from exactly head on.
                  Lumenus is smart clothing designed for cyclists, runner, or motorcyclist-- crossing over into any activity that needs (or wants) to Be Brighter! Our intuitive navigation system pulls from Google Maps backend meaning it will work in over +100 countries worldwide! Let the Lumenus software plan and track your routes.
You shouldn't be stuck with your nose in a screen, especially when you're out enjoying something you love to do, particularly when that something requires your undivided attention. We subscribed to the theory of remaining connected, but not tethered, and that’s exactly what the Lumenus software provides. Too often we see walkers buried in their device unaware of their surroundings, or cyclists that take their eye off the road to check their map, for just one second too long.. That's why Zero UI is a key.We can #BeBrighter with Lumenus #ZeroUI solution to safety and performance.
Wearable Tech, according to Wikipedia, “are clothing and accessories incorporating computer and advanced electronic technologies.” That said, this is the Hardware part of this campaign, let’s tell you about our advanced tech.
 Lumenus has developed products that can easily transition with you from activity to work or dinner look great and are designed for life. You're going to love how they look and want to wear them wherever you can. The ability to customize your lighting is really what makes them perfect for any occasion.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           COLLABORATION
We've already received accolades for the products and extreme interest in partnering with leading brands all the way from helmets and bikes to deep sea diving and established moto racing brands! Keep an eye out to see who Lumenus could partner with in the near future (stretch goal?!). We’ve added a collaboration tier, if you think that your brand is ready to partner on building the future of wearable tech reach out and we can discuss the particulars—but we’d love to partner with likeminded brands that want to make something truly special.
This year at CES we will be presenting at booth #74726 and will highlight our initial designs to share with the world what we’ve been working on together throughout the campaign!
AFFILIATES
Affiliate Program: Here at Lumenus we understand that this is a greater issue than we are ready to address alone. So we're teaming up with a network of programs for advocacy and safety along with change makers that we believe in as a brand.
If you’re a likeminded organization that wants to enhance safety and cycling advocacy reach out and we’d love to partner with you! We believe “Life isn’t about finding yourself, Life is about creating yourself.” We plan on creating an incredible future and want to work with those who aim for the same thing!
OTHER COPY
In today's world your success is measured by how much of an impact you leave on the planet. We strongly believe that it is our responsibility to give back to our community in order to create something larger than ourselves. ---As fuel costs rise and people become more aware of the environmental impact involved with car use, bicycle riding has become a more common form of transportation, even on busy streets and highways. Because few cities have designated bike paths or lanes, cyclists must share the road with both small and large motor vehicles; sometimes those vehicles do not pay proper attention to bike riders and engage in unsafe driving habits. Compared to a car or truck driver, bikers have little to no protection if they are involved in an accident. As a result, the injuries a cyclist incurs during a crash, even when wearing a helmet and protective gear, are often more severe than those sustained by motorists. Common bicycle accident injuries include road burn, fractured limbs, head and neck injuries, traumatic brain injuries, and even death. One-third of American workers commute 1-5 miles each way to the office, which is a short enough distance that the number of cyclists may continue to increase. Commuting to work by bike has increased 60 percent in the last decade.

Help us make save lives and #BeBrighter by supporting our KickStarter campaign!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our team is comprised of individuals who have brought dozens of high end consumer electronics products for top name brands to market over the past decade. We have carefully selected the very best suppliers available who share our vision of creating the ultimate in wearable tech. We are using the highest end brand name components such as TI chips and LG battery cores and leaving no stone unturned. That said, we have yet to mass produce these pieces, and through the process or trial production and beta testing the unexpected is, well the unexpected. We have padded our dates to account for a bit of that and are confident in our delivery schedule and our team’s ability to execute.

campaign.story:
B-My's Logo
B-My's Homemade Salsa - 100% All Natural (aka Organic) Salsa
Delicious, homemade salsa without the added preservatives or pesticides!
Our Story:
Hello, and thank you for taking the time to read about our campaign! We are B-My’s Homemade Salsa! Our products are 100% all-natural, completely organic with no preservatives, artificial colors or flavors, and are NON GMO without the use of pesticides! We use the freshest, most local ingredients we can find, and avoid filling our salsa with added water for filler. Our ingredients include all “real” foods; we don’t bother with things like garlic powder or chili powder, we use the real thing! Our deliciously chunky salsa will show you the actual vegetables that were used in the recipe!
B-My’s started shortly after I became a first-time home owner, most importantly, with my very own garden! I was blessed with a bumper crop that year, and had 2 dozen habanero peppers left over at the end of the season. Not wanting them to go to waste, I created my own salsa recipe and began canning my top-secret salsa for friends and family. Everyone agreed this was better than any salsa on the market, and that I’d be a fool not to sell it! And so, B-My’s Homemade Salsa was born!
We have already had a super successful campaign for our first batch of homemade salsa, and are ready to give it another go with this season’s crop!
Impact:
Everyone wants to eat healthy, and as sustainably as possible. But with store-bought products, you can never really be sure what’s going into your food! At B-My’s Homemade Salsa, we pride ourselves in being completely, 100% organic, with locally sourced ingredients and no filler, dried spices, or anything else getting in the way of delicious, spicy flavor!
What We Need:
We are seeking a minimum funding amount of $500 to be used to purchase a mega quantity of 16 oz jars, at a reasonable price, to be used for our winning salsa products. We are also planning on purchasing a higher-end color labeling machine so we can upgrade our label designs, with the next goal of getting our salsa into retail stores! If we are able to raise enough, our stretch goal will help us rent a commercial kitchen, and ultimately purchase a plot of land so we can make this enterprise a 100% self-sustaining and growing process!
What kinds of salsas will we have available right away?
Regular Salsa (no spice, just awesome salsa)
Mild Salsa (A little bit of spice, but not overwhelming)
Jalapeno Salsa (Just a little more spicy)
Breath of Fire Salsa (Almost unbearable)
Dragons Breath Salsa (Made with Ghost peppers - with over 1 million SHU (Scoville Heat Units) you might need to sign a waiver before trying this!)
Note: All of our salsas are cooked and sealed air-tight, and made to be shelf-stable for 12-18 months!
Backers who donate at least $7 will receive their very own jar of salsa, in their choice of flavor, as well as a mention on our website, a sticker showing our logo, and a thank you postcard to show our appreciation!
Need more than one jar to get by? No problem! Select the corresponding reward level and order as many jars of salsa as you’d like!
And don’t forget! We also have T-Shirts available! If you are interested in one, just add $25.00 to your order as an adder!!
Other Ways You Can Help:
If you can’t make a donation at this time, there are still ways you can help support our campaign! Please take a few moments to share our campaign and company information with your friends and family via social media, email, and through word of mouth!
Thank you in advance for your support and generous donations!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any online funding campaign, we understand that there may be some snags along the way as we reach our funding goals and bring our next batch out for our tremendous backers. We have the added challenge of being completely reliant on the local crop that’s available to us, so if we run into a drought season, or for any other reason the crop isn’t as expected, we may not be able to produce the same amount of salsa as we had anticipated. In this particular case, we will do our best to source out additional locations to purchase our ingredients so we don’t let you down!

We may also run into problems with production, packaging, etc as we prepare the orders for you. Rest assured, we will keep in constant communication with you through our website, as well as this funding site, to keep you “in the loop” in the unlikely event of a production or shipping delay!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Odd Draw is a hilarious and strategic table top game. Players select and interpret 3 cards and create a drawing based on them. Then, they must think quickly to invent a clever story explaining how the character they've created fits a "circumstance" the dealer has selected. The thing is, no one knows what the circumstance is until AFTER they’re done drawing!
Circumstances include: Who would you trust to babysit your kids for the weekend? Who’s the real Batman? (NSFW - Who is cooking meth in Albuquerque? Who would give the best ****job?)
With a new circumstance every round, the game constantly changes, challenging players to think quickly and strategically and be creative. NO ART SKILLS REQUIRED! CONFUSED? DON'T WORRY - IT'S EXPLAINED STEP-BY-STEP BELOW.
Odd Draw is perfect for you if you love: pissing yourself from laughter, debating (using your brain), pulling funny stories from your you know what..., games like Exploding Kittens and Cards Against Humanity, good times, trying new things, dolphins and/or puppies.
HAVE FUN!
- The Odd Draw team
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
For our last Kickstarter project, with the help of 271 backers around the world, we were able to produce a deck of good deed cards. We had gone through dozens of suppliers sampling their quality of cards and boxes. We reached out to many of those same suppliers for quotes on Odd Draw, but because this game is a lot larger than a 56 card deck, we reached out to a few dozen other suppliers as well, including the suppliers who produced Exploding Kittens and Cards Against Humanity!

All of the artwork and designs are complete for this game, and we have a top 5 list of suppliers waiting on stand by. No matter how much this campaign raises, you will get an amazing game with high quality paper and materials, but it can be upgraded and be even better. 

The supplier we choose will ultimately depend on how much is raised in this campaign, as each supplier can offer us different things like box upgrades (embossed text, foil print, glossy finish), and higher quality cards (thicker, more durable, linen finish etc). We want this campaign to be as successful as possible so we can produce the absolute finest quality finish possible for you! So please share our project with your friends, and let's make this game the best it can be! Remember, you get free rewards for referring friends too! Thank you so much for your support! :)

- The Odd Draw Team

campaign.story:
Overview
Devil's Advocate is a table top card game designed for parties of 4-16 people. It draws inspiration from: Would You Rather?, Poker, Rock-Paper-Scissors and people who like to argue on Facebook (everyone).
The Product
Inside and out, Devil's Advocate is a beautifully designed card game. You'll be proud to display it on your shelf, and even prouder when you use the game to prove to your friends how much better at arguing you are. The final deck will be composed of 504 poker-sized playing cards inside a boldly colored box. Those choosing the "Hellfire Package" will receive additional items (see rewards section).
What's Unique
Like most creative products, Devil's Advocate is a combination of many ideas. In terms of game mechanics, the reason DA is superior to other games on the market is that it requires each player to be involved in every round. And because it's not a winner take all scenario during each of those rounds, all players will feel motivated to participate throughout the entire game. If you'd like to see more detailed instructions, you can do so here.
Why Pledge Now
Supporting this Kickstarter will ensure Devil's Advocate becomes a reality. And by backing it here and now, not only will you be getting it for less than retail, but the first 1000 backers will also get the game before the holidays.
Gratitude
Designer: The extremely talented Josh Boston
Advisors: Katie Kendall, Steve Kendall, Adam Kmiec, Adam DeVarney, Tyler Travitz, John Geletka, Tim Dres, Tim Harris.
Email Provider: Active Campaign and John Morrison
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Paper cuts. Lots of paper cuts. But seriously, this is a pretty simple project for anyone who is good at planning ahead (which I am). I have the designs, I have a local printer in Chicago, and I have a partner for distribution. My biggest challenge is getting these games to everyone before the holidays, but assuming the funding is on course mid-way through I'll get started early on printing before the campaign is even over. As you can imagine, small delays may pop-up here and there, but my aim is to make sure that the first 1000 backers get this game before they slice the first Christmas ham, light the first Hanukkah candle, or perform the first feat of strength for Festivus.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Guess who collectively helped Devil's Advocate reach $20,000 and now will receive a free upgraded stainless steel reader card? YOU.
Now it's onto the next stretch goal at $30K: The Mini-NSFW Expansion Deck.
It's pretty safe to say that Devil's Advocate is a PG-13 game. This was done intentionally because party games are often played with family. While it definitely is edgy, you won't have to provide grandma with a detailed explanation of "smegma." That said, many R-Rated cards were written and ultimately left out of the final deck. With your help, if the Kickstarter hits $30,000 in the next 10 days, I will send all backers (at the $25 level and higher) a free mini-expansion pack with a set of NSFW reader cards.

campaign.story:
Greetings & Salutations!
Thank you for visiting our campaign! If you are here, you may have a love for great grandma Gloria's mahogany coffee table and a fierce hatred for condensation. Maybe your constant ceramic coffee cup companion calls for a custom coaster. Perhaps, your affection for fine furniture frustrates you for lack of matching accessories. Whatever your need, we assume you are here to solve a problem and we have just the solution for you!
Everybody needs a coaster!
Want to add a handsome accessory to your drink-ware? Looking to protect your heirloom furniture? Want a personalized piece of art in your dining room? Our simple, elegant, and customizable coasters crafted from verified sustainable or reclaimed hardwoods will be an eye-catching addition to your table or bar.
These hardwood coasters are available in 3 shapes and 4 wood varieties, each measuring 4" across and 1/4" thick. Choose from circle, rounded square, and curved square (see image below for exact shapes). Finished with multiple coats of acrylic lacquer for a great shine, long life, and water resistance.
About Our Wood
One of the core principles at our woodshop has always been to use reclaimed, salvaged, and sustainable wood sources. The Walnut, Maple, and Cherry woods used in our coasters are harvested as part of Appalachian Hardwood Verified Sustainable program. Click on the image below to find out more!
The "Blue Pine" wood that is used for our coasters is actually from a tree called the Lodgepole Pine. These trees have been killed by beetles carrying a fungus that changes the color of the wood. These trees are removed from the forest floor and milled into lumber to prevent risk of injury and forest fires. To learn more about the Pine Beetle Epidemic, head over to National Geographic.
Coaster Wood Choices
Coaster Shape Choices
We are currently offering 3 basic shapes for our coasters. We may add a few more options as stretch goals, but the 3 starter shapes are below:
Monogram Options
For the custom engraved coaster rewards, a monogram is included. Monograms come in two varieties. A single letter monogram usually represents a family name. A 3 letter monogram can represent a person's initials or two individuals' first name initials and their last name initial in the middle. You can select from one of the 3 styles below for your monogram:
Rewards
Add-ons
In addition to a coaster reward, you can add on the following items by increasing your pledge the appropriate amount:
$5 - Whidden's Woodshop Tote Bag
$8 - Resuable Alder Wood Thank You Card
$10 Reward: Alder Wood Thank You Card
Why Kickstarter?
Whidden's Woodshop is currently our young family's primary income. We have been running our small family business for almost a year at this point. We currently have Etsy shop and sell items locally at craft fairs and art shows, but that isn't enough to provide for our growing family of 6 (and 2 cats).
Kickstarter allows for global exposure and creates permanent relationships with people who are passionate about what we create and also with potential retail buyers.
Our goal for this campaign is to raise enough funds to fulfill all our rewards, purchase additional equipment for our shop, and to provide for monthly expenses for our family.
Check out our campaign statistics at Kicktraq!
Our coaster cuddling cat, Bubbas.
Check out our Etsy store to see what else we create!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There is only one risk associated with this campaign. Because all of the items are handmade, we could run into delays if I get sick or some other unforeseen event occurs.

campaign.story:
We care about biking. Not just exercise. It’s experience.
As bikers ourselves, we very much enjoy the whole combination of self-relaxation, feeling the breeze and socializing with bros and sis. Bike lights have always been one of the guards to secure our journey. However, traditional bike lights have little more than on and off, and operation between the front and rear lights have not been convenient either, spoiling our mood.
With STELLIGHT, we have two goals – to ease fellows from worrisome troubles with bike lights; to add unique fun and versatility by having different blinks to suit mood and purposes with our patent pending technology.
                     Flexible Mounting - Leaving space for other gadgets
Keep calm and feel it
I’m energetic
Trendsetter
To see
Alert reckless drivers
Save energy on a lit road
Control “The REAR” with the FRONT KNOB
                     STELLIGHT APP
Supports both Andriod and iPhone
Upload light patterns from STELLIGHT APP to the FRONT or the REAR wirelessly by BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy Connectivity)
Smartphone not involved once patterns are uploaded to the FRONT or the REAR
Change pattern of the FRONT and the REAR by rotating FRONT knob, since the two are connected by BLE
STELLIGHT is simple to use!
by STELLIGHT WEB
by sharing with friends
by DIY light patterns:
On STELLIGHT APP
Supports both Android and iPhone
DIY: design brightness of each of the six LEDs and interval of flash
Change of brightness of each LED up to 50Hz, enough for smooth fade-in and fade-out patterns or high frequency flashing alert patterns
DIY light patterns in your own way. One light, unlimited possibilities!
DIY whatever light pattern of your taste
STELLIGHT APP
                      As lovers and supporters of Kickstarter, we designed a limited edition, each with a serial number from 0-99. It’s unique, incomparable by any other lights.
To design a bike light best for biker’ use, we have poured hours into researching and surveying a large number of bikers. What’s good about the current bike lights? What needs to be improved? What do they look for if they buy a new bike light? If they can be a little bit greedy, what funny points would they like to add to the light?
There have been a lot of changes from the very first design of STELLIGHT.
Initial Designs of STELLIGHT
And here comes the final version.
Final Design
CNC Prototyping
Field Testing and Photo Shooting
The Grabo Team, a team of energetic and devoted electronic and software engineers, have had several years of experience in electronic engineering and product design projects, one of which being GestureR, our former successful project on Kickstarter. STELLIGHT is our first product designed not just for electronic DIY lovers but also the general public.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
CNC machined housing is used for STELLIGHT to make it durable and fashionable. Though its production time is longer than plastic counterparts, we are confident that the manufacture of STELLIGHT will be on schedule since they will be produced by CNC factories which we have partnered for years.
For the good of early backers, the assembly and packing procedures will also be split into smaller lots instead of one big lot. The shipping will be done in the order of backing.
Given the years of experience in developing innovating new products, we are confident about managing the production process and any issues that may arise.

campaign.story:
Deuce Badge: Badass Detective is a 30 minute adult humored animated comedy series. Located  in the fictional Hampton City, where crime is at an all time high, Detective Deuce Badge is it's only hope. This self proclaimed lady getting, heart breaking, ass kicking pretty boy has zero tolerance for evil and is determined to bring all lawbreakers to justice. With the help of a supporting group off odd - but interesting - cohorts, Deuce will be sure to piss you off while protecting his city.

***WARNING***
Detective Deuce Badge is usually outwardly insulting, sometimes displaying moronic behavior with little to no regard for your feelings and or opinions.
Just don't call him a douche bag!
MY GOAL
My name is Michael Zachariah White. Screenwriter and Creator of Deuce Badge: Badass Detective. I created Deuce Badge some years back with a dream of bringing him to life. Not knowing which avenues to take or what resources to utilize I found myself stuck in a dead end. For years, Deuce was nothing  more than an idea...Until now!
With your support I will finally be able to have my pilot script professionally animated with HD rendering and studio quality voice-overs from a team of talented voice actors. Your support will also fund my marketing campaign to TV producers and my entry into independent film festivals. I want to make this show a household hit and I want you to be apart of this journey.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
When it comes to fulfilling a promise, there are always potential risks to encounter. As an independent artist and amateur screenwriter, There's a huge chance I may not be taken as seriously by Agents and TV/Animation production companies. With that in mind, I became a registered writer with the WGA and have done extensive research on what it takes to be successful in this business. I feel that I have sufficient knowledge and a long list of legitimate resources to land this project into every independent film company in the industry. In conclusion, I believe the biggest obstacle I will face, is getting the world to fall in love with Deuce Badge: Badass Detective.

campaign.story:
A 3 Meter Extra-Long, Tangle-Free, Charging Cable
When we began designing our charging cable, we realized that there were other, similar (yet less reliable) products on the market, but they contained a few critical flaws to their design:
● Too short! There is nothing worse than trying to charge your phone at one outlet, but realizing that the nearest flat surface, or where you were planning to store your phone, is on the other side of the room! This is never a problem with our strong cable.
● Tangles = Breakage For those of us who have used charging cables, we know that tangles aren’t only unsightly, but a tangle left to its own devices can cause breakage along the length or end of the cable. Eventually, it causes the cable to rip or break altogether. Not only does our unique cover protect the cable from breakage, but it also prevents tangles outright with a nylon fabric casing.
● Cheaply Made Products Don’t Last Sure, you could buy a dollar-store charging cable as a last resort, but how long will that last? Cheaply made charging cables are notorious for breaking, not holding the charge, or even completely falling out of the device mid-charge. Why risk your expensive device with a cable that could possible break your phone? Our product contains quality materials produced by careful craftsmanship by a small, independent company. 
Impact:  The Strong Cable features incredible innovation, and vastly improves upon the average charging cable. We have built solid relationships with our suppliers, and we have already thoroughly vetted their supplies and our resulting products. We have a strong foundation for this product, but we need your support to help us get there! 
What We Need & What You Get: We are seeking the support of the community to help us meet our 400 item MOQ (Minimum Order Quantity). By donating to our campaign, you are helping us reach our goals and push towards wide distribution of our product, marketing the Strong Cable, and much more. 
Additional funding will be used towards the costs related to rewards, furthering our campaign and more! To thank our generous backers, we are offering numerous exciting rewards at a variety of donation levels. Please view the rewards on the right-hand side of the page and select the reward that works for you!
Other Ways You Can Help: If you can’t make a donation at this time, there are still other ways you can help us reach our goals! Please take a moment to share our campaign with your friends and family via social media, email, and word of mouth. With your support, we can reach our funding goals and meet our minimum order quantity requirements!
iPhone 6s, 6, 5s, 5c, 5
iPad Air 2, Air, Mini
iPod Nano 7
iPod Touch 5
Android Devices (Micro USB)
Windows Phones (Micro USB)
This timeline provides us with an adequate amount to deliver the Strong Cable. We do not foresee any potential delays and have done our best to smooth out any kinks in our process. If any further delays are expected our backers will be notified immediately! 
The Strong Cable will be sent to Apple to receive MFI certification. This will allow us to use the "Made for iPhone/iPod/iPad" logo on our product. MFI certified accessories use certified Apple connectors purchased directly from Apple. This means that you will receive a higher quality product. We have built solid relationships with our suppliers who have experience producing MFI certified products. We have no worries that our product will receive this certification and have a strong faith in our product.
Thank you in advance for your support and donations!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With any project, there are risks and challenges that must be considered before going forward. These can include:

● Supply Chain: Manufacturing Delay
A delay in the supply chain would cause us to miss our promised shipping deadlines. We don’t anticipate that this will become a problem, as we have developed really close relationships with our suppliers and have worked out a generous timeline that we intend to beat. 

● Fulfillment Capacity 
If we generate a lot of interest and we get swamped with orders, it is possible that fulfillment and shipping will be delayed. However, we have worked out a schedule for our project to ensure that we allow plenty of time to ship our orders in a timely fashion. We will be devoting our full-time efforts to this project.

Above all, we want our potential backers to know that we plan to be very upfront and honest about any delays or challenges that we run into along the way. If we happen to run into delays during production or distribution, we will let you know about it as soon as we know about it!

campaign.story:
Jack Kudos came to light as we want to create a family friendly game that everyone can enjoy. It's simple with a sweet and fruity story line. 
Some say, "Laughter is the best medicine." It's good for your health in so many ways, as it reduces stress, pain and conflict. It increases your heart rate and releases a ton of endorphins to make you happy. Laughing is also contagious!
We here at BondsWell enjoy making others laugh and we love to laugh ourselves. We feel that this game will only increase that joy and make the world even happier. Our hearts are into this project and we will not disappoint! We invite you to join us in this happiness and fun-filled journey for all.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have had the idea for quite some time so we have gone through many scenarios on how the game can be played. We will start with the basics and add in more gamification concepts so it's so enjoyable that you do not want to put it down!

In addition, we have created most of the graphics already (as you can see from our video above) with critical thought and lots of love.

It's time to turn this from project "hopeful" to project "for reals". 

We have a good core team and a steel-ironed plan in place and will do what it takes to bring Jack Kudos to life! We promise to keep you posted on the progress as well.

We invite you to join us in this happiness and fun-filled journey for all.
